BOOK THIRTY-NINE. Entry into the Realm of Reality
bam po brgyad cu drug pa;

bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal/ skyabs med pa la zas sbyin pa'i kun dga' ra ba'i nang / pho brang brtsegs pa bkod pa rgya chen po can na/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dang / 'jam dpal la sogs pa 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes pa dam pa'i ye shes dang / brtan pa dam pa'i ye shes dang; chags med dam pa'i ye shes dang / me tog dam pa'i ye shes dang / nyi ma dam pa'i ye shes dang / zla ba dam pa'i ye shes dang / dri med dam pa'i ye shes dang / rdo rje dam pa'i ye shes dang / rdul med dam pa'i ye shes dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang mdzad dam pa'i ye shes dang / byang chub sems dpa' skar ma'i rgyal mtshan dang / ri rab rgyal mtshan dang / rin chen rgyal mtshan dang / chags med rgyal mtshan dang / me tog rgyal mtshan dang / dri med rgyal mtshan dang / nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan dang / mdzes pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / rdul med rgyal mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen gzi brjid dang / blo gros chen po'i gzi brjid dang / ye shes rdo rje'i gzi brjid dang / dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid dang / chos kyi nyi ma'i gzi brjid dang / bsod nams ri bo'i gzi brjid dang / ye shes snang ba'i gzi brjid dang / kun nas dpal gyi gzi brjid dang / kun nas 'od dpal gzi brjid dang / byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu snang bas rgyas par 'gengs pa'i gzi brjid dang / byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang / pad+mo'i snying po dang / rin po che'i snying po dang / nyi ma'i snying po dang / yon tan rnam dag snying po dang / chos rgya mtsho'i snying po dang / rnam par snang ba'i snying po dang / gtsug gi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' pad+mo'i dpal gyi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' bzang po'i mig dang / rnam par dag pa'i mig dang / dri ma med pa'i mig dang / chags pa med pa'i mig dang / kun nas blta ba'i mig dang / shin tu rnam par blta ba'i mig dang / ut+pa la'i mig dang; rdo rje'i mig dang / rin po che'i mig dang / byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i mig dang / byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan dang / chos kyi dbyings snang ba'i blo gros cod pan dang / byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i cod pan dang / phyogs rnam par snang ba'i cod pan dang / sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag par byung ba'i snying po'i cod pan dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i cod pan dang / kun nas rnam par snang ba'i cod pan dang / zil gyis non pa med pa'i cod pan dang; THUS HAVE I HEARD. At one time the Blessed One was in Sravasti, in a magnificent pavilion in the garden of Anathapindada in the Jeta grove, together with five thousand enlightening beings, led by Samantabhadra, the universally good enlightening being, and Manjushri. de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong tsam ste/ kun kyang byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang / smon lam gyi byung ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par 'geng [?] pa chags pa med pa'i spyod yul can de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi drung du 'dong bas lus mtha' yas pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su bstan pa/ rnam par dmigs par bya ba la bsgribs pa med pa'i mig gi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i tshe/ nye bar 'dong pa rgyun mi gcod pas tshad med par phyin pa/ chos rgya mtsho'i tshul thams cad la ye shes snang ba rab tu thob pas snang ba mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa/ tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa rnam par dag pas/ bskal pa mtha' yas par shin tu ston pa mi zad pa/ 'gro ba'i bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du gzugs kyi lus yongs su ston pas/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyis klas pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul rnam par dag cing mi gnas pa/ sems can gyi khams sems can med pa dang / srog med pa yongs su shes pas rab rib med pa/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du 'od zer gyi dra bas rgyas par 'gengs pas nam mkha' dang mnyam pa sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /

Beginning with these, there were five thousand great enlightening beings, all of whom had undertaken the acts and vows of universally good enlightening beings and were unhindered in their sphere of action, pervading all buddha-lands. They manifested boundless bodies, going to all buddhas. The sphere of their unobstructed eye was pure, seeing the miracles of all buddhas. They had attained to infinity in revelations, ceaselessly approaching the entries into enlightenment of all buddhas. Their illumination was measureless, having attained the light of knowledge of principles and didactic devices of the ocean of teachings of all buddhas. They could explain virtues forever, through purity of intellectual powers. They were unfettered in the purity of the realm of knowledge vaster than space, being able to appear in the world in any physical form they wished. They were clear-sighted, knowing the realm of beings to be void of beings or souls. They had spacelike knowledge, pervading all universes with a net of lights.

nyan thos rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa lnga brgya ste/ thams cad kyang bden pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin mngon par khong du chud pa/ yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du gyur pa/ chos kyi rang bzhin la zhugs pa/ srid pa'i rgya mtsho las gyen du 'phags pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs su 'gyur ba'i spyod yul can kun nas sbyor ba dang / bag la nyal ba dang / bcings pa rnam par bzlog pa/ chags pa med pa'i gnas la brten pa nam mkha' ltar zhi ba la rnam par spyod pa/ sangs rgyas la the tshom dang / nem nur dang yid gnyis yongs su chad pa; sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rgya mtsho la mos pa'i lam du zhugs pa sha stag dang / 'jig rten gyi dbang po sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa/ 'gro ba thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don du zhugs pa/ gsol ba ma btab par dge ba'i bshes gnyen du gyur pa/ sems can gzhan bsrung ba la zhugs pa/ 'jig rten thams cad las 'phags pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi sgo la zhugs pa/ sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa'i spyod yul la byung ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yongs su bsrung ba la zhugs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi rigs yang dag par gzung ba'i smon lam gyis yang dag par skyes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung gi rgyud du 'byung ba mngon du gyur pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon par mos pa sha stag dang yang thabs gcig go /

There were also five hundred hearers with great spiritual powers, all of them perfectly aware of the essence of true reason and the principles of truth. They had arrived at direct witness of the limit of reality, had penetrated the nature of phenomena, had gotten out of the ocean of existence and into the realm of space of those who have arrived at suchness, had stopped their propensities and habits and were beyond regression, dwelled in the abode of nonattachment and nonobstruction, were in a state as tranquil as space, had cut off all doubt in Buddha, and had entered the path intent on the ocean of buddha-knowledge.
There were also world rulers, who had served past buddhas, who had accomplished the welfare and happiness of all beings, who were unsolicited benefactors, who had accomplished the protection of others, who had entered into the bliss of the highest knowledge in the world, who were never indifferent toward sentient beings, who issued from the realm of the buddha-teaching, who had accomplished the preservation of the buddha-teaching, who vowed to sustain the lineage of buddhas, who were oriented toward birth in the family of buddhas, who sought omniscient knowledge.

de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa de dag dang / nyan thos rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi dbang po 'khor dang bcas pa de dag 'di snyam du gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi bsnyengs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par spyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mnga' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang; de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi smon lam dang / sngon legs par spyad pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang; dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi skyabs dang / dad pa'i mig yongs su dag pa dang / rgya chen po la mos pa'i snang bar rab tu thob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa dang / bsam pa thag pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon cing / yang dag par zhugs pa ma gtogs par lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis 'jug pa'am/ khong du chud pa'am/ yid ches pa'am/ yongs su shes pa'am/ rnam par rtogs pa'am/ gzung ba'am/ rnam par dpyad pa'am/ rnam par bsgom pa'am/ rnam par dbye ba'am; rnam par grol ba'am/ rab tu brjod pa'am/ sems can pha rol gyi rgyud du phyin par bya bar ni mi nus na/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis bdag cag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa'i tshul ji lta ba dang / sems can bsam pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang / mos pa sna tshogs dang / shes pa sna tshogs kyi tshig dang brda sna tshogs su gyur pa/ dbang bsgyur ba'i sa gzhan dang gzhan la gnas pa/ dbang po sna tshogs su rnam par dag pa/ bsam pa dang sbyor ba rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan can/ sems dang bsam pa'i yul gzhan dang gzhan can/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gzhan dang gzhan la gnas pa/ chos bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan la mos pa dag la/ sngon thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du zhugs pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / sngon byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su mnan pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor mngon par bsgrubs pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i tshul mngon par bsgrubs pa rnam par phye ba'i snang ba lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / sngon byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi bkod pa yongs su dag par mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / sngon byang chub sems dpa'i 'byung ba'i tshul rgya mtsho mngon par bsgrubs pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag par bsgrub pa dang; rnam par 'phrul pa'i bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sgos rnam par 'phrul ba lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba dang / khyu mchog gi mthu lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / rnam par 'phrul ba lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems can gyi khams gdul ba'i thabs kyi sgo lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos kyi grong khyer la mnga' mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi lam snang bar mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi gnas su gshegs shing / rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi yon bzhes pa mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams dang / yon ston pa'i cho 'phrul mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi tshul la/ sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan dmigs pa mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad la rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad la yongs su bstan pa dang / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul bsam gyis mi khyab pas rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang snyam pa dang /

At that time it occurred to those enlightening beings and their companions, to those hearers of great spiritual powers, and to those world rulers and their companions, “It is not possible for celestials or humans to understand or enter into or focus on or know or cognize or think about or perceive clearly or distinguish or elucidate or establish in the body and mind of other beings the sphere of the enlightened, the realm of knowledge of the enlightened, the basis, the power, the fearlessness, the concentration, the state, the mastery, the body, or the knowledge of the enlightened, except by the support, the magic, the empowerment, and the past vows of the enlightened, by having the qualities of roots of goodness perfected by past buddhas, by being in the charge of spiritual benefactors, by purification of faith, liberative means, and knowledge, by attainment of illumination of higher devotion, by purification of the higher will of enlightening beings, and by the proceeding of the higher will on the undertaking of realizing omniscience. May the Buddha show us, enlightening beings and sentient beings—according to our dispositions, different mental capacities, different orientations, different perceptions, different languages, different attainments, different masteries, different stages, different purity of faculties, different mental efforts, different realms of thought, focus on different qualities of buddhahood, and orientation toward various teachings—his past procedure toward omniscience, and show us his past undertaking of the vows of enlightening beings, his past purification of the spheres of the transcendent ways of enlightening beings, the wonder of his past accession to the stages of enlightening beings, his past fulfillment of the undertakings of the spheres of practices of enlightening beings, the appearance of his past accomplishment of the vehicle of enlightening beings, his past purification of the embellishment of the path of enlightening beings, the arrays of his past accomplishments of the ocean of ways of emancipation of enlightening beings, the splendors of the ocean of spiritual transformations he experienced in the past as an enlightening being, the oceans of his past efforts as an enlightening being, the oceans of his spiritual transformations on the threshold of perfect enlightenment, the power of his spiritual manifestations in turning the wheel of truth as a buddha, the oceans of spiritual transformations involved in buddha-land purification, the Buddha’s methods of guiding sentient beings to liberation, the Buddha’s lordship of the city of principles of omniscience, the Buddha’s revelations of the paths of all sentient beings, the Buddha’s transfigurations entering into the states of all beings, the Buddha’s receiving of gifts from beings, the Buddha’s presentations of teachings on right giving to all sentient beings, the Buddha’s projection of the image of Buddha into the mental states of all beings, the Buddha’s displays of miracles to sentient beings, the Buddha’s miracles of teaching and admonishing sentient beings, and the Buddha’s inconceivable manifestations of the realms of concentration of Buddha to all beings — may the Buddha show us these things.”

de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyi yongs su rtogs pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas/ seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin nam mkha' dang mnyam pas dpe med pa/ 'gro ba thams cad du rnam par snang ba'i rgyan dang ldan pa/ thugs rje chen po'i sgo'i rang bzhin can/ thugs rje chen po'i sgo dang ldan pa/ thugs rje chen po'i sngon du 'gro ba/ thugs rje chen po'i chos can la mnyam par bzhag go/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de ltar mnyam par bzhag ma thag tu/ pho brang brtsegs pa rgyan chen po can yang mtha' dang dbus med par yangs shing / rdo rje thub pa med pa'i rgyan mtshan gyis sa'i gzhi rab tu brgyan pa dang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad kyi dra ba kun du bkram pa/ rin po che du ma'i me tog sil mas chal par gang ba/ nor bu rin po che dam pa mdzes par bkram pa dang / bai DUr+ya'i ka bas mdzes par byas pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po 'gro ba rnam par snang bas rgyan shin tu rnam par phye ba dang / rin po che bzang po mang po dang ldan pa'i nor bu rin po che/ 'dzam bu'i chu klung gi phung pos shin tu brgyan pa dang / rin po che thams cad las sgo gang dang / rta babs dang; pu shu dang / skar khung byas shing / khri 'phang grangs med pa rnam par dag pas brgyan pa dang / 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad dang 'dra ba'i nor bu rin po che'i rgyan dang ldan pa dang / 'gro ba rgya mtsho'i nor bu rin po che rnam par phye ba dang / nor bu rin po che thams cad kyi dra bas kun nas yog pa'i gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan rab tu bsgreng ba dang; sgo dang / rta babs thams cad las 'od zer chos kyi dbyings su rgyas par 'gengs pa rab tu 'byung bas rnam par mdzes par byas pa dang / phyi rol gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i gzhi stegs bu brjod du med pas brgyan pa dang / phyogs kun nas them skabs kyi phreng ba nor bu rin po ches brtsegs shing / shin tu rnam par phye bas rab tu mdzes par kun nas gnas par gyur to/ /

Then the Buddha, knowing what the enlightening beings were thinking, entered the concentration known as “the coming forth of the lion,” a world-illumining manifestation, of which the body is great compassion, the entryway is great compassion, the guide is great compassion, the means of access to the sky of truth is great compassion. As soon as the Buddha had entered this concentration, the magnificent pavilion became boundlessly vast: the surface of the earth appeared to be made of indestructible diamond, the surface of the ground covered with a net of all the finest jewels, strewn with flowers of many jewels, with enormous gems strewn all over; it was adorned with sapphire pillars, with well-proportioned decorations of world-illumining pearls of the finest water, with all kinds of gems, combined in pairs, adorned with heaps of gold and jewels, with a dazzling array of turrets, arches, chambers, windows, and balconies, made of all kinds of precious stones, arrayed with jewels in the forms of all world rulers, and embellished with oceans of worlds of jewels, covered with all kinds of jewels, with flags, banners, and pennants flying in front of all the portals, the adornments pervading the cosmos with a network of light. Outside the grounds where the inexpressibly vast circle of the assembly was, there was a magnificent array of balustrades, and in each direction was a stairway consisting of a mass of jewels, adorned superbly in a well-ordered fashion.

dze ta'i tshal thams cad kyang / chu zheng gab par shin tu yangs shing rgya che bar kun nas gnas par gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang / chu zheng kun du rgya che zhing yangs pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan sna tshogs dang ldan zhing / sa'i gzhi nor bu rin po che sna tshogs brjod du med pas kun nas grub pa dang / nor bu rin po che grangs med pa'i bas kun nas bskor ba dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing ta la'i phreng bas mdzes pas brgyan par kun nas gnas par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na spos chu'i chu klung tshad med pa klong mtha' yas par 'khyil ba'i spos kyi chus yongs su gang ba/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi me tog mang po dang 'dres par gyur la g.yas phyogs su 'khyil zhing 'bab pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dbyangs su sgrog pas rab tu brgyan pa dag kyang kun nas gnas par gyur to/ /rin po che'i me tog puN+Da ri ka'i phreng ba dang / rin po che'i shing gam yo rin po che thams cad kyi pad+mo rab tu rgyas shing / shin tu 'phags pas mdzes par bkod pa dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i phreng ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa nor bu rin po che thams cad kyi dra bas kun nas yog pa/ nor bu rin po che grangs med pa'i dra ba kun du snang bas brgyan cing mdzes pa dang / nor bu rin po che'i gzhal med khang nor bu rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa grangs med pa/ spos thams cad kyi ngad kun nas 'byung ba/ bdug spos kyi sprin gyi rgyan dang ldan pa dag kyang kun nas gnas par gyur to/ /rin po che'i rgyal mtshan grangs med pa dang / gos kyi rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyi rgyal mtshan dang / rin po che'i snam bu'i rgyal mtshan dang / me tog gi rgyal mtshan dang / rgyan gyi rgyal mtshan dang / phreng ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi dril bu'i rgyal mtshan dang / rin po che'i rgyal po'i gdugs kyi rgyal mtshan dang / nor bu rin po che snang bas kun du rgyas par 'gengs pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan gyi 'khor lo'i dbyangs rab tu sgrog pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po seng ge yid du 'ong ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon gyi sbyor ba rab tu sgrog pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po chos kyi dbyings thams cad rab tu snang ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / rgyal mtshan gyi rgyan rnam par phye ba thams cad phyogs kun nas rgyan du gyur pa dag kyang kun nas gnas par gyur to/ /

Also the Jeta grove and buddha-fields as numerous as atoms in untold buddha-fields all became coextensive, vastly expanded, by the power of Buddha. There appeared varied arrays of all kinds of jewels, plains variously set with untold jewels, fences of uncountable jewels set around, and palm trees of various jewels arrayed in rows. Also in those lands were innumerable rivers of fragrant water, winding endlessly, filled with perfumed water, with turbulent rapids of flowers of all jewels, whirling to the right, producing the sounds of the sayings of all buddhas. There were also inconceivable rows of jewel white lotuses, trees adorned with arrays of lotus blossoms made of jewels, as well as inconceivable numbers of rows of towers of various gems, enveloped in nets of all kinds of jewels, arrays of countless jewels radiating webs of light, countless arrays of all kinds of jewels, of celestial chariots of jewels, and arrays of chests of all kinds of incense releasing banks of all fragrances. There also stood innumerable emblems of jewels, emblems of cloth, emblems surfaced with jewels, emblems of flowers, emblems of ornaments, emblems of garlands, emblems of nets of small bells made of all kinds of jewels, emblems of parasols of the finest gems, emblems of jewels pervading everywhere with their radiance, emblems of the finest jewels resounding with the names of all buddhas, emblems of the finest jewels of leonine splendor, emblems of the finest jewels bespeaking the past efforts of all buddhas, emblems of reflections of all objects, arrays of emblems of the finest jewels, well-distributed arrays of ornaments of all kinds of emblems, standing in all quarters.

dze ta'i tshal gyi nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad kyang lha'i gzhal med khang gi sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pas brgyan par kun nas gnas par gyur to/ /dze ta'i tshal nyid kyang spos sna tshogs kyi shing grangs med pa'i sprin byis kun nas yog cing brgyan pa dang / brjod du med pa'i rgyan sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyis kun nas 'khor cing bkod pa dang / rol mo brdung ba dang / dkrol ba brjod du med pa'i sprin las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod pa'i dbyangs dang / nga ro snyan pa 'byung bas kun nas brgyan pa dang / rin po che'i pad+mo brjod du med pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog cing brgyan pa dang / rin po che'i seng ge'i khri brjod du med pa'i steng lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i stan bting ba la byang chub sems dpa' 'khod cing / de bzhin gshegs pa la bstod pa'i sgra dbyangs snyan pa 'byin pa'i sprin gyis kun nas brgyan pa dang / lha'i dbang po brjod du med pa'i gzugs brnyan mngon par 'byung ba'i nor bu rin po che'i 'bru'i sprin gyis kun nas brgyan pa dang / mu tig dkar po'i dra ba'i sprin brjod du med pas kun nas brgyan pa dang / mu tig dmar po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin brjod du med pas kun nas yog cing brgyan pa dang / rdo rje lta bur sra ba'i mu tig gi sprin brjod du med pa'i char mngon par 'bab pas rab tu brgyan par kun nas gnas par gyur to/ /

The entire sky of the Jeta grove was also adorned with inconceivable celestial cloud-palaces, countless clouds of trees of all fragrances, untold mountains of all kinds of magnificent arrays, untold sweet sounds of clouds of music and songs of praise of all buddhas, untold clouds of jewel lotuses, untold jewel lion thrones spread with celestial jeweled cloth with enlightening beings sitting on them singing beautiful eulogies of buddhas, individual pearly clouds in the forms of celestial lords facing the earth, untold clouds of webs of brilliant white pearls, untold clouds of towers of ruddy pearls, and untold clouds of diamond-raining ornaments.

de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos dkar po'i tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyu mchog gi mthu dang / byin gyi rlabs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gcig 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rgyas par 'gengs pa rnam par 'phrul ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gcig tu zhugs pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par phye ba thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'i byin gyi rlabs yongs su ston pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs par yongs su ston par mdzad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro/ /
de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ba spu'i bu ga gcig tu sngon gyi mtha' de bzhin gshegs pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa yongs su ston par mdzad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 'od zer gcig gi sgo nas 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa snang bar 'gyur ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ba spu'i rtse mo gcig las sprul pa'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ba spu'i sgo gcig nas 'jig rten gyi khams 'du ba dang / 'jig pa'i bskal pa yongs su ston pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro/ /ji ltar dze ta'i tshal de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pas yongs su dag par kun nas gnas par gyur pa de bzhin du/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad kyang yongs su dag par kun nas gnas shing rab tu brgyan pa dang / shin tu spud pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i skus yongs su rgyas pa dang / dze ta'i tshal du yang dag par gzhol ba dang / byang chub sems dpas yongs su rgyas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho shin tu rnam par gnas pa dang / rgyan thams cad kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi 'od kyis rab tu snang ba dang / rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab pas brgyan pa dang / zhing thams cad kyi bkod pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog par brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi lus thams cad kyi sprin gyi char rab tu 'bab pas brgyan pa dang / me tog sna tshogs thams cad kyi sprin shin tu rgyas pa'i lhun gyis kun tu rgyas shing brgyan pa dang / gos thams cad kyi shing gi sprin gyi mdzod nas gos kha dog sna tshogs su mdzes pa'i char rab tu 'bab pas brgyan pa dang / phreng ba dang / lda ldi dang / se mo do'i rgyan thams cad kyi sprin gyi char rgyun mi 'chad par mngon par 'bab pas brgyan pa dang / spos sna tshogs kyi bdug spos phyogs kun nas 'thul ba'i sprin dang / na bun gyi char thams cad kyi lus kyi dbyibs ltar mngon par 'bab pas brgyan pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi dra ba'i sprin las rin po che'i rgyal po'i phye ma zhib bu'i char rgyun mi 'chad par rab tu 'bab pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyi sprin lha'i bu mo'i lag na khyer ba/ nam mkha'i dbyings kun du rgyu zhing 'khor bas brgyan pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'dab ma'i dkyil 'khor can; chu ba mthon po dang ldan pa'i ze ba la rol mo bkod pa/ kun nas sgra 'byin cing dbyangs snyan par sgrog pas brgyan pa dang / rin po che'i 'bru sna tshogs kyi dra ba dang / rin po che seng ge'i dra ba sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa'i phreng ba dang / se mo dos [?] brgyan par kun nas gnas shing snang bar gyur to/ /

What was the reason for that? So inconceivable is the virtue of the Buddha, the mass of pure qualities of Buddha, the mighty power of Buddha, the miracle of Buddha’s pervasion of all worlds with one body, the display by all buddhas of the array of all buddha-lands in one body, the buddhas’ display of the reflections of all phenomena in a single atom, the buddhas’ display of the succession of all buddhas of past ages in one pore, the buddhas’ illumination of the stream of atoms in all worlds with a single beam of light, the buddhas’ pervasion of all buddha-lands with clouds as numerous as atoms in all worlds emitted from one pore, and the buddhas’ display of the ages of becoming and decay of all worlds in a single pore: as the Jeta grove was in this way purified as a buddha-field, so were all worlds in the ten directions, throughout the space of the cosmos, likewise purified, appearing adorned, decorated, with the body of the Buddha clearly manifest therein, all together in the Jeta grove, filled with enlightening beings, with the ocean of Buddha’s audience standing in orderly ranks, clouds raining all kinds of adornments, lights of energy of all jewels, decorations raining from clouds of all jewels, decorations covered with clouds of arrays of all lands, ornaments raining from clouds of all celestial bodies, ornaments raining from clouds of all flowers, flowery ornaments pervading space, clouds of all kinds of cloth raining robes of various colors, ornaments continuously showering densely from clouds of all kinds of garlands and wreaths, ornaments showering in the forms of all beings from clouds of various incenses hovering everywhere, ornaments of fine powders, dense webs of jewels, raining from clouds of webs of flowers made of all jewels, ornaments of clouds of all kinds of precious banners and pennants held by celestial maidens and carried around the sky, ornaments of lotuses of all jewels with circles of leaves of various gems set atop poles with filaments hanging down, their rustling producing sweet sounds, and ornaments of garlands of various jewels on the body of Buddha, a network of images of all jewels—all of these appeared there.

de ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin chen po seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa de la mnyam par bzhag ma thag tu/ de'i tshe shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams/ gser gyi sprin sgron ma'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad dpal gyi gzi brjid rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang ba'i smon lam gyi gtsug gi 'od zer snang ba zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ nam mkha'i dbyings rgyan sna tshogs kyi sprin gyis brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi me tog gi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / lha rdzas kyi spos kyi sprin gyi char rab tu dgye ba dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i pad+mo'i sprin gyi char mngon par gtor ba dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba'i sprin gyi char rab tu btang ba dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyan gyi sprin gyi char mngon par gtor ba dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i gdugs kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bsgrub pa dang / kha dog sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad cing shin tu phra ba'i lha rdzas kyi gos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang ba dan gyi sprin nam mkha'i dbyings las byin gyi rlabs pa dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi rgyan yid du 'ong bas nam mkha'i dbyings rgyas par 'gengs par byed cing / mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste; 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ shar phyogs su brten te khang pa brtsegs pa rgyan kun dang ldan zhing / nor bu rin po che'i dra bas kun nas khyab pa dang / seng ge'i khri nor bu rin po che phyogs rab tu snang ba'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas/ nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i dra ba'i rgyan gyis kun nas brgyan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas/ skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do/ /

As soon as the Buddha had entered this “coming forth of the lion” concentration of buddhas, from the buddha-land of a buddha named King of Splendorous Illuminating Radiance, in the world Golden Cloud Lamp Emblem, which was to the east, beyond as many oceans of worlds as atoms in untold buddha-lands, a great enlightening being named Light from the Origin of the Vows of the Illuminator, given leave by that buddha, left that vast assembly and came to this world Endurance along with as many enlightening beings as atoms in untold buddha-lands, adorning the sky with clouds of various magnificent arrays, showering a rain of clouds of celestial flowers, celestial perfumes, celestial jewel lotuses, celestial garlands, celestial gems, celestial ornaments, celestial jewel parasols, and fine celestial robes of various colors, setting up clouds of celestial jewel banners and pennants in the sky, filling the sky with beautiful arrays of clouds of all jewels; having come to the buddha with these, the great enlightening being and the company of enlightening beings paid respects to the Buddha, then, going to the east, magically produced towers covered with nets of jewels arranged all around, and lion thrones inside of lotuses made of the finest radiant gems, and sat on them, after having covered their bodies with ornamental webs of wish-fulfilling jewels.

lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi snying po zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi snying po kun nas snang ba'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi shugs thub par dka' ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad spos kyi lda ldi dang dra bas kun du 'brel bar byin gyis brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byams klas pa thams cad rin po che sna tshogs kyi lda ldi dang // dra ba chen pos kun du 'brel bar byin gyis brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyud thams cad me tog thams cad kyi lda ldi dang / phreng ba'i dra bas kun nas 'brel bar byin gyis brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'khor thams cad phreng ba dang / lda ldi dang / se mo do'i dra bas kun nas 'brel bar byin gyi brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'og gi gzhi rten rdo rje thams cad kyi phreng bas yongs su gzung bar byin gyis brlab pa dang / /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi tshul thams cad nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi dra bas kun nas 'brel bas byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad gos sna tshogs kyi lda ldis kun nas yongs su blangs shing gzung bar byin gyis brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rin po che sna tshogs kyi lus kyi phreng ba dang / lda ldi mang po'i dra ba kun nas 'brel bar mngon par bsgrub pa dang / zhing thams cad nor bu rin po che dpal gyi 'od zer gyi lda ldi dang phreng ba'i dra bas kun nas 'brel bar byin gyis brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rin po che rnam par snang ba'i lda ldi dang dra bas kun du 'brel bar byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gzhi nor bu rin po che seng ge yid du 'ong ba'i phreng ba dang lda ldi'i dra bas yongs su gzung bar byin gyis brlab pa byed cing / mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ lho phyogs su brten te/ nor bu rin po che 'gro ba la rnam par snang ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang / seng ge'i khri nor bu rin po che phyogs kun tu snang ba'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul te/ rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi dra ba'i rgyan gyis kun nas brgyan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas/ skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do/ /

From the south, beyond as many oceans of worlds as atoms in untold buddha-lands, from the land of the buddha King of the Treasury of All-Illumining Radiance, in the world of Diamond Ocean Womb, a great enlightening being named King of Invincible Energy, together with a company of as many enlightening beings as atoms in untold buddha-lands, given leave by that buddha and having disappeared from that assembly, came to this world Endurance, causing all oceans of worlds to appear decked with webs of all fragrances, causing every place in all buddha-lands to appear decked with webs of garlands of all jewels, causing all groups of lands to appear decked with webs of garlands of all flowers, causing the locations of all buddha-lands to appear decked with webs of braids of all kinds of garlands, causing the congregations in all buddha-lands to be supported by a diamond ground, causing the structures of all buddha-lands to be joined with webs of all kinds of jewels, causing all worlds to appear swathed in all kinds of cloth, conjuring up images of all buddha-lands decked with webs of bundles of garlands bearing images of all jewels, causing all lands to appear decked with webs of strings of the finest radiant jewels illumining all their adornments, and causing all worlds to appear held by a foundation of webs of strings of the most excellent jewels. The great enlightening being and company came and presented all this to the Buddha, then went to the south, magically produced towers of world-illumining jewels with lion thrones inside radiant jewel lotuses, and sat thereon, covering the enlightening beings’ bodies with ornamental webs of flowers made of all kinds of jewels.

nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i ri rab rnam par snang ba'i rgyal mtshan mar me zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes sgron ma'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' dpal kun nas 'phags pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad bdug spos kha dog sna tshogs dang / dri sna tshogs su ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad spos kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad bdug spos kha dog dang dri du mar ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad spos kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po mdangs 'byung ba/ sa thams cad kyi rdul gyi kha dog dang 'dra ba'i ri rab kyi sprin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad nor bu rin po che skar ma'i rgyal mtshan 'od kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs kyi bkod pa dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad rin po che'i rgyal po rdo rje'i snying po kha dog sna tshogs can/ bkod pa rnam pa tha dad pa'i yul dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad nor bu rin po che 'dzam bu'i chu klung / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du snang ba'i yul dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po chos kyi dbyings thams cad rab tu snang ba'i ri rab kyi sprin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas khyab par byin gyis brlab pa dang / sems can gyi khams kyi yul thams cad nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan rab tu snang ba'i ri rab kyi sprin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi nam mkha' rin po che'i rgyal po/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon gyi sbyor ba rab tu snang bar yongs su ston cing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgra 'byin pa'i ri rab kyi sprin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang / phyogs bcu thams cad rin po che'i rgyal po/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po byang chub rab tu snang ba'i 'od dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par 'gengs pa byed cing / mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas nub phyogs su brten te/ khang pa brtsegs pa spos kyi rgyal po thams cad kyi lhun dang ldan pa/ mu tig gi dra bas kun nas khyab pa dang / seng ge'i khri nor bu rin po che lha'i dbang po rab tu snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas/ rin po che gser gyi dra bas kun nas brgyan pa dang / yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i cod pan bcings pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas/ skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do/ /

From the west, beyond as many oceans of worlds as atoms in untold buddha-lands, from the land of the buddha Lamp of Knowledge of the Realms of the World and the Realm of Reality, in the world Lamp Representing the Radiance of a Polar Mountain of Jewels, a great enlightening being named King of Fiery Energy of Universal Splendor, together with a company of as many enlightening beings as atoms in untold oceans of worlds, given leave by that buddha and having disappeared from that assembly, came to this world Endurance, filling all universes with clouds of mountains of fragrant banners of various colors, as many as atoms in untold buddha-lands, filling all universes with clouds of flowers of various scents, mountainous clouds of aromatic smoke of many kinds of incense, clouds of fragrances of various kinds, mountainous clouds of the finest jewels formed by lights from every hair in the shapes of all utensils, mountainous clouds of jewels like stars adorned with various spheres of light, mountainous clouds of spheres of various arrays of diamonds, mountainous clouds of jewels illumining all worlds, mountainous clouds of the finest jewels reflecting the elements of all mountains covering the sky, mountainous clouds of the finest jewels reflecting the appearances of all buddhas, mountainous clouds of jewels resounding with the practices of enlightening beings showing the images of the past efforts of all buddhas, and mountainous clouds of the finest jewels reflecting the summits of enlightenment of all buddhas, all these clouds as numerous as atoms in untold buddha-lands, filling all universes. These the great enlightening being and company brought and presented to the Buddha; they then went to the west and magically produced towers of the finest fragrances covered with nets of pearls, and lion thrones in lotuses made of jewels presenting the appearances of the lord of gods, and sat thereon, having covered their bodies with gold and jewels and put on crowns of wish-fulfilling gems.

byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams/ rin po che'i gos yongs su snang ba zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings nam mkha'i dpal rnam par snang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chags pa med pa'i dpal gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ nam mkha'i dbyings rin po che'i snam bu'i sprin gyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings rin po che'i gos kha dog ser po dang / mdog ser po'i sprin gyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings rin po che'i gos/ spos sna tshogs kyis dri zhim por byas pa'i sprin gyi char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings rin po che'i rgyal po nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan gyi sprin gyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings nor bu rin po che gser gyi mdog shin tu 'bar ba'i sprin gyis rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che 'bar ba'i gos kyis sprin gyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings rin po che skar ma thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan gyis sna tshogs su gyur ba'i gos kyi sprin gyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings phyogs bcu kun nas/ nor bu rin po che snam bu khra bo'i rdo ltar snang ba'i sprin gyis yongs su rgyas par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings phyogs bcu kun nas rin po che'i rgyal po rnam par snang ba'i dpal rab tu 'bar ba'i 'od dang ldan pa'i gos kyi sprin gyis yongs su rgyas par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings phyogs bcu kun nas nor bu'i rgyal po snang ba shin tu gsal bas phyogs kyi dbyings rnam par snang ba'i gos kyi sprin gyis yongs su rgyas par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings rin po che'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i rgyan gyi gos kyi sprin gyis kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa byed cing / mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ 'khor dang bcas pa bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas byang phyogs su brten te/ rin po che'i rgyal po rgya mtsho yongs su 'byung ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang / seng ge'i khri bai DUr+ya'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas/ nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po seng ge mdzes pa'i dra bas yongs su brgyan pa dang / rin po che skar ma'i rgyal mtshan mgo la thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas; skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do/ /

From the north, beyond as many oceans of worlds as atoms in untold buddha-lands, from the land of the buddha Glorious Illuminator of the Space of the Cosmos, in the world Luminous Banner of Jewel Cloth, a great enlightening being named King of Unobstructed Splendor, together with a company of as many enlightening beings as atoms in untold oceans of worlds, given leave by that buddha and having disappeared from that assembly, came to this world Endurance, producing in the sky ornamental clouds of diadems of all jewels, ornamental clouds of jeweled robes of yellow color, with a yellow glow, ornamental showers from clouds of jeweled robes emitting various fragrances, ornamental clouds of robes of the finest sunlike jewels, ornamental clouds of robes of jewels blazing with golden splendor, ornamental clouds of robes of fiery jewels, ornamental clouds of robes of various jewels reflecting all the stars, clouds of robes of jewels of pale radiance bursting into view everywhere, clouds of robes of the finest jewels blazing with radiant splendor bursting into view everywhere, and clouds of robes of the finest jewels illumining everywhere with a radiant glow bursting into view everywhere, causing the sky to appear veiled in clouds of robes of jewels in oceanic arrays. These the great enlightening being and company offered to the Buddha; they then went to the north and magically produced towers made of the finest pearls from the sea, as well as lion thrones inside jewel lotuses, and sat thereon, having covered their bodies with nets of majestic jewels and tied starlike pearls in their topknots.

byang dang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams sa chen po thams cad du mdzes pa'i rin po che'i 'od zer gyi dra ba rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs pa'i spyan gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings su shin tu 'phrul ba'i smon lam zla ba zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad spos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad bdug spos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad tsan dan gyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad rdo rje'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad gser gyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad gos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad pad+mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa byed cing / mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ byang dang shar gyi phyogs mtshams su brten te/ nor bu rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa sgo chos kyi dbyings thams cad la mngon par lta ba dang / seng ge'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po spos mtshungs pa med pa'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas/ rin po che'i rgyal po'i me tog gi dra bas yongs su brgyan pa dang / rin po che'i rgyal po mdzod sna tshogs kyi dra ba'i cod pan bcings pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas/ skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do/ /

From the northeast, beyond as many oceans of worlds as atoms in untold buddha-lands, from the land of the buddha Independent Eye, in the world Emanating Webs of Light Beams from All the Finest Jewels of the Earth, a great enlightening being named Supreme Moon of Vows Emanated through the Cosmos, together with a company of as many enlightening beings as atoms in untold oceans of worlds, given leave by that buddha and having disappeared from that assembly, came to this world Endurance, causing all worlds to be completely covered with clouds of sandalwood towers, clouds of flower towers, clouds of pearl towers, clouds of diamond towers, clouds of gold towers, clouds of towers of robes, and clouds of lotus towers. The great enlightening being and company presented these to the Buddha, then went to the northeast and magically produced towers of enormous jewels, with turrets with doors looking on all things, and lion thrones in jewel lotuses of incomparable fragrance, and sat thereon, having covered their bodies with nets of the finest flowers and put on crowns of various interlaced jewels.

shar dang lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi sprin bkod pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa klu dbang rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi 'od 'phro ba dang ldan pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i sprin gyi kha dog kun tu khyab par bya ba dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad rin po che kha dog mtha' yas pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzod spu'i kha dog gi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad rin po che sna tshogs kyi kha dog lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad pad+mo'i snying po'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad nor bu'i rgyal po/ rin po che'i shing gi yal ga'i dkyil 'khor lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad 'dzam bu'i chu klung gi gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad nyi ma'i kha dog lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad zla ba dang / skar ma'i tshogs kyi kha dog lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par byed cing / mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ shar dang lho'i phyogs mtshams su brten te/ rin po che rdul dang bral zhing rnam par snang ba phun sum tshogs pa'i me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa dang / seng ge'i khri rin po che seng ge rdo rje'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas/ nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che'i 'od zer rab tu 'bar ba'i dra bas yongs su brgyan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do/ /

From the southeast, beyond as many oceans of worlds as atoms in untold buddha-lands, from the land of the buddha Dragon King, in the world Banner of Arrays of Clouds of Fragrance, an enlightening being named King of Fiery Energy of Truth, together with as many enlightening beings as atoms in untold oceans of worlds, given leave by that buddha and having disappeared from that assembly, came to this world Endurance, covering the whole sky with clouds of spheres of golden light, clouds of spheres of light of jewels of infinite colors, clouds of spheres of light the color of the curl of hair between the Buddha’s eyebrows, clouds of spheres of light of various jewel colors, clouds of spheres of light the color of the inside of lotuses, clouds of spheres of light the color of superb jewels like circles of branches of jewel trees, clouds of spheres of light like the knot on the head of Buddha, clouds of spheres of light the color of fine gold, clouds of spheres of light the color of the sun, and clouds of forms of the discs of the sun and moon and stars. The great enlightening being and company brought and presented these to the Buddha, then went to the southeast and magically produced towers of flowers of coolly shining pearly radiance, and lion thrones in lotuses of excellent diamonds, and sat there, having covered their bodies with the finest pearls blazing with jewel light.

lho dang nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i nyi ma rab tu snang ba'i snying po zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo'i ye shes kun tu snang ba'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'thor ba'i ye shes rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas me tog 'od 'phro ba'i sprin/ nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas rol mo 'od 'phro ba'i sprin nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas nor bu rin po che 'od 'phro ba'i sprin nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas rin po che'i gos 'od 'phro ba/ spos dang bdug spos sna tshogs kyis rnam par bdug pa'i sprin nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas klus rnam par sprul pa'i glog 'od 'phro ba'i sprin nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba 'od 'phro ba'i sprin nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas nor bu rin po che gser rab tu 'bar ba 'od 'phro ba'i sprin nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas rin po che'i rgyal po dpal gyi snying po 'bar ba 'od 'phro ba'i sprin nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas nor bu rin po che de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa rgya mtsho ltar dus gsum gyi rgyud rab tu snang ba'i tshul dang ldan pa 'od 'phro ba'i sprin nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye ba byed cing / mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ lho dang nub kyi phyogs mtshams su brtan te/ nor bu rin po che chen po 'od zer gyi dra ba phyogs kun tu mngon par gzhol ba'i thig les chos kyis dbyings thams cad du rab tu snang ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang / seng ge'i khri nor bu rin po che spos kyi sgron ma'i 'od 'phro ba'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas; rin po che'i rgyal po dri ma med pa'i snying po'i dra bas yongs su brgyan pa dang / rin po che'i rgyal po sems can thams cad rab tu 'dzud pa'i dbyangs dang ldan pa'i cod pan bcings pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do/ /

From the southwest, beyond as many oceans of worlds as atoms in untold buddha-lands, from the land of the buddha King of Universal Light of Knowledge of the Moon of Truth, in the world Filled with Jewel Sunlight, a great enlightening being named Standard of Knowledge Scattering All Bands of Demons, together with a company of as many enlightening beings as atoms in untold oceans of worlds, given leave by that buddha and having disappeared from that world, came to this world Endurance, from every pore issuing, to the farthest reaches of space, shining clouds of flowers, shining clouds of all kinds of music, shining clouds of jewels, shining clouds of precious robes emitting aromatic vapors of various scents, shining clouds of lightning produced by water spirits, shining clouds of radiant jewels, shining clouds of blazing gold jewels, shining clouds of the blaze of diamonds from splendorous mines, and shining clouds of eye-jewels illumining the seeds of events of past, present, and future, like the ocean of memory of the enlightened. The great enlightening being and company presented these to the Buddha, then withdrew to the southwest and magically produced towers of great jewels illumining the cosmos, particles of a web of light beams radiating in all directions, and lion thrones in lotuses of shining jewels like fragrant lamps, whereon they sat, having covered their bodies with nets of the finest jewels from pure mines and put on crowns of the finest jewels reverberating with the sounds of the abodes of all beings.

nub dang byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi ri bo kun nas rnam par snang ba'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang ba'i smon lam ye shes dpal zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gzugs brnyan gyi sprin kun tu dgye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi lus kyi gzugs brnyan gyi sprin kun tu dgye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi lus kyi gzugs brnyan gyi sprin kun tu dgye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sprul ba'i tshogs kyi gzugs brnyan mang po'i sprin kun tu dgye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon gyi sbyor ba'i gzugs brnyan mang po'i sprin kun tu dgye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du byung ba'i nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lus kyi gzugs brnyan rab tu dgye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po byang chub dang / byang chub kyi shing gi gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan gyi sprin kun du dgye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul ba'i gzugs brnyan mang po'i sprin kun tu dgye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyi lus kyi gzugs brnyan gyi sprin kun tu dgye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan gyi sprin kun tu dgye bas skad cig skad cig tu nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs shing / mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas; nub dang byang gi phyogs mtshams su brtan te/ rin po che'i rgyal po phyogs kun nas rnam par snang ba'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri rin po che 'gro ba rnam par snang ba'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas/ mu tig 'od thub pa med pa'i dra bas yongs su brgyan pa dang / rin po che 'od kun tu snang ba'i cod pan bcings pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas/ skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do/ /

From the northwest, beyond as many oceans of worlds as atoms in untold buddha-lands, from the land of the buddha Majestic King of Radiant Splendor, in the world Containing Vows of Illumination, a great enlightening being named Flame of Knowledge of Vows of Illumination, together with a company of as many enlightening beings as atoms in untold oceans of worlds, given leave by that buddha and having disappeared from that assembly, came to this world Endurance, emanating from every physical characteristic, every pore, every part of the body, clouds of physical images of the buddhas of past, present, and future, clouds of physical images of the enlightening beings of past, present, and future, clouds of physical images of the audiences of the buddhas of past, present, and future, clouds of images of the spheres of emanations of the buddhas of past, present, and future, clouds of embodiments of images of the past efforts of the buddhas of past, present, and future, clouds of physical images of all hearers and individual illuminates of past, present, and future, clouds of images of the bodies of the buddhas of all times and the forms of the trees at their sites of enlightenment, clouds of embodiments of images of the miracles of the buddhas of past, present, and future, clouds of physical images of the rulers of the worlds of past, present, and future, and clouds of all the purified buddha-lands of past, present, and future, these all pervading space from moment to moment. The great enlightening being and company came to the Buddha, presented these, then withdrew to the northwest and magically produced towers containing the finest jewels illumining all quarters and lion thrones in lotuses made of jewels illuminating the world, and sat thereon, having covered their bodies with nets emanating unstoppable light and put on crowns of jewels whose radiance illumined everywhere.

'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes nam mkha' lta bur chags pa med pa'i dpal gyi rgyal mtshan rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bsgribs pa thams cad rnam par 'thor ba'i ye shes kyis rnam par gnon pa zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas 'gro ba thams cad kyi skad dang / sgra dang / dbyangs dang / nges pa'i tshig mngon par bsgrubs pa rgya mtsho rab tu brjod pa dang / dus gsum gyi byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 'byung ba'i tshul rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi 'brug sgra rab tu bsgrags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa'i tshul rgya mtsho'i dbyangs rab tu bsgrags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i tshul rgya mtsho'i sprin gyis sgra rab tu bsgrags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor zhing thams cad du rgyas par 'gengs pa'i tshul rgya mtsho'i dbyangs rab tu bsgrags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i tshul rgya mtsho'i dbyangs rab tu bsgrag pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byang chub pa'i snying por gshegs pa dang / bdud kyi dkrugs ma rnam par 'thor ba dang / byang chub pa'i snying por rnam par 'tshang rgya ba dang / rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad pa'i dbyangs rgya mtsho rab tu bsgrag pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / mdo sde'i tshul dang / ming rgya mtsho'i dbyangs kyi sprin gyi 'brug sgra bsgrag pa dang / 'gro ba 'dul ba thams cad dus la bab pa'i 'khor los 'dul ba'i chos kyi tshul dang thabs kyi sgra rab tu bsgrag pa dang / ye shes thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ smon lam ji ltar btab pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i khyad par dang / dus dang / thabs dang / chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho'i dbyangs rab tu bsgrag pa byed cing / mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ 'og gi phyogs su brtan te; de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzhal med khang gzugs brnyan rab tu snang ba'i rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi mdzod kyi khang pa brtsegs pa dang / seng ge'i khri rin po che thams cad kyi gzugs kyi pad+mo'i snying po yongs su bzung ba dag mngon par sprul nas/ rin po che'i snying po byang chub thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan rab tu snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi cod pan mgo la bcings pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas/ skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do/ /

From the nadir, beyond as many oceans of worlds as atoms in untold buddha-lands, from the land of the buddha King of the Banner of the Torch of Unobstructed Knowledge, in the world Radiance of the Halos of All Buddhas, a great enlightening being named Valiant One with Knowledge to Dissolve All Barriers, together with a company of as many enlightening beings as atoms in untold oceans of worlds, given leave by that buddha and having disappeared from that assembly, came to this world Endurance, emitting from every pore the sounds of utterances of the ocean of all incantations in the world, the sounds of the clouds of the oceans of instruction of the enlightening beings of past, present, and future, sounds of the ocean of vows, undertakings, and methods of all enlightening beings, sounds of the ocean of enlightening beings’ means of pervading all lands with their spheres of action, sounds of the clouds of the oceans of all enlightening beings’ means of purification and fulfillment of the ways of transcendence, sounds of the ocean of means of the accomplishments and spiritual effects of all enlightening beings, oceans of expressions of the spiritual transformations by means of which all buddhas go to the summit of enlightenment, disperse the opposition of demons, and realize enlightenment, clouds of sounds of the ocean of words used by all buddhas in turning the wheel of the teaching, expressions of the expedient means of teaching and training used to guide all people at the appropriate times, sounds of the ocean of means of teaching using methods appropriate to the aspiration, excellence of roots of goodness, and time, in order to lead to all-knowledge. Emanating these sounds, the great enlightening being and company came to the Buddha and offered them in respect, then withdrew to the nadir, magically produced towers of various mines of all kinds of jewels from the matrix of light of the palaces of all buddhas, as well as lion thrones in spaces held by lotuses inset with all jewels, upon which they sat, having put on crests of jewel emblems reflecting images of all sites of enlightenment and covered their bodies with nets of the finest jewels illumining all lands.

steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi zad pa shin tu ston pa zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor kun tu snang ba'i dbyings kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings kyi smon lam gyi gzhi rab tu rtogs pa zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad dang / yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang / tshig gi lam thams cad dang / gos dang / smad g.yogs thams cad nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor thams cad dang / bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dang / sngon gyi mtha'i mur thug pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa thams cad dang / phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa lung bstan pa dang / lung ma bstan pa dang / ma byon pa thams cad dang / da ltar byung ba phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab 'byams thams cad na bzhugs pa rnams kyi sngon sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mdzad pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho dang / len pa dang / sbyin pa'i dngos po thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po dang / ba spu'i sgo dang / lus thams cad dang / yan lag dang / nying lag dang / tshig gi lam dang / gos dang / smad g.yogs thams cad la rab tu snang bar gyur par rnam par bstan pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu snang bar yongs su bstan pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa/ yan lag dang / nying lag thams cad 'thub pa rab tu bstan pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi brtson 'grus dang / drag shul dang / rnam par gnon pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsam gtan rgya mtsho yongs su tshol zhing rab tu bsgrub pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i tshul yongs su bsgrub cing chos yongs su tshol ba dang ldan pa dang / bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong zhing / shin tu zhe non pa'i lus dang / ngo'i gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs par bya bas sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong zhing dga' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi lam la 'gro ba thams cad mngon par mos par byed pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam rgya mtsho mngon par grub pa'i sgo yongs su dag pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rab tu grub pa dang / rnam par mngon pa dang / rnam par dag par byas pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang / chos kyi dbyings rgya chen po rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad kyi sprin gyis rgyas par bkang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa byed cing / mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ steng gi phyogs su brten te/ rdo rje dbang po sna tshogs thams cad kyi rgyan gyi snying po can gyi khang pa brtsegs pa dang / seng ge'i khri rdo rje dang / in+d+ra nI la'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che thams cad rab tu 'bar ba'i dra bas kun nas brgyan pa dang / rin po che'i rgyal po dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dang dbyangs su sgrog pa'i phreng ba rab tu 'phyang ba dang / mgo la rin po che'i cod pan thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas; skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do// //

From the zenith, beyond as many oceans of worlds as atoms in untold buddha-lands, from the land of the buddha Voice Revealing the Sphere of Universal Knowledge, in the world Description of the Inexhaustible Lineage of Buddhas, a great enlightening being named Revealing the Base of Cosmic Aspiration, together with a company of as many enlightening beings as atoms in untold oceans of worlds, given leave by that buddha and having disappeared from that assembly, came to this world Endurance, from every physical feature, every pore, every part of the body, every limb and joint, every utterance, every article of clothing and adornment, showing images of the oceans of past efforts of all buddhas past, present, and future connected with transcendent giving which took place in all lands of the ten directions, as well as images of the receivers and the gifts, reflected in every mark and embellishment, every pore, every part of the body, every limb and joint, every utterance, every article of clothing and adornment of the company of enlightening beings as well as the buddha Vairocana; showing reflections of the oceans of their past efforts involved in transcendent morality, in transcendent tolerance—even involving showing amputation of limbs, in the transcendent energy of all enlightening beings, surging boldly forward, in the seeking and attainment of the ocean of meditations of all buddhas, in the seeking of the ultimate truth to which the wheel of teaching of all buddhas leads, in the manifestation of the embodiment of great determination which relinquishes all there is, in the joy of the vision of all buddhas, the path of all enlightening beings, and pleasing all beings, in the arrangements of purification of means of accomplishment of the ocean of vows of all enlightening beings, in the purification of the strength of the attainment of transcendent power of all enlightening beings; and showing images of the oceans of past efforts involved in the sphere of knowledge of all enlightening beings—all these reflected images bursting into plain view by clouds of all kinds of miraculous displays throughout the cosmos. The great enlightening being and company offered these to the Buddha, then went to the zenith, magically produced towers of various arrays of diamonds as well as lion thrones of the universally good enlightening being inside emerald lotuses, and sat thereon, having covered their bodies with nets of fiery jewels and put on crowns of jewels with crests of trailing strings of diamonds vibrating with the names of the buddhas of past, present, and future.
ba ma po brgyad cu bdun pa/

byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'khor dang bcas par/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang / smon lam gyis byung ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung nas zhal du lta ba ye shes yongs su dag pa'i mig dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dang / mdo sde'i tshul gyis gsung rgya mtsho la rna ba yongs su gzhol ba/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbang rab tu thob par bya ba la pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi drung du 'dong ba/ skad cig skad cig tu yongs su bstan par rnam par 'phrul pas byung ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad lus gcig gis rgyas par dgang ba'i yul dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du lus su mngon par 'byung zhing / rnam par snang ba rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khams gcig tu snang zhing khongs su chud par yang dag par ston pa'i yul dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i dus la sdod par gzhol ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i sprin gyi 'brug sgra/ ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas rab tu sgrog pa'i yul dang ldan pa/ sems can gyi khams thams cad sgyu ma lta bur yongs su shes pa rab tu thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mig yor lta bur khong du chud pa/ srid pa'i rgyud du skye ba thams cad rmi lam lta bu shes par byung ba/ las dang rnam par smin pa thams cad gzugs brnyan lta bur shes pas rnam par dag pa/ ye shes mngon par grub pa thams cad smig rgyu lta bur mngon par shes pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa thams cad sprul pa lta bur khong du chud pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu thob pa/ mi 'jigs pa'i khyu mchog dang / seng ge'i nga ros rnam par gnon pa/ tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa/ mi zad pa'i rgya mtshor zhugs pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi skad rgya mtsho dang / chos kyi nges pa'i tshig gi ye shes rab tu thob pa/ chos kyi dbyings dang nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul
