bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /grong na gnas pa'i sems can rnams la khams gsum pa thams cad las 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /yul gyi 'dabs na gnas pa'i sems can rnams la nyan thos dang rnag byang chub kyi lam las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa la rab tu dgod par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /grong rdal na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams la chos kyi rgyal po'i pho brang du gnas par 'gyur ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /phyogs mtshams na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams la dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /phyogs na gnas pa'i sems can rnams la chos thams cad kyi ye shes mngon par shes par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /'dod chags la gcig tu dga' ba'i sems can rnams la mi sdug pa'i sgos 'khor ba'i sred pa rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir chos ston to/ /zhe sdang la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la byams pa chen po'i tshul rgya mtsho la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /gti mug la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la chos thams cad kyi sgo rgya mtsho rab tu 'byed pa'i ye shes mngon par shes par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /cha mnyam pa la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la theg pa thams cad kyi smon lam gyi tshul rgya mtshos khyad par du 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /'khor ba'i yul gyi dga' ba'i bsam pa can gyi sems can rnams la 'khor ba'i yul dga' ba rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir chos ston to/ /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad kyis gtses pa'i sems can rnams la 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad kyis nye bar nyon mongs pa med par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /de bzhin gshegs pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la mi skye ba'i gnas yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir chos ston to/ /phung po la gnas pa'i bsam pa can gyi sems can rnams la gzhi med pa'i chos kyi spyod yul la rnam par spyod par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /bsam pa zhum pa'i sems can rnams la lam gyi rgyan gyi khyad par yang dag par bstan par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /mtho ba'i nga rgyal can gyi sems can rnams la chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi bzod pa yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir chos ston to/ /g.yo sgyu'i yul gyi bsam pa dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /

Those who are lazy I teach in such a way as to purify transcendent vigor. Those whose minds are confused I teach to attain the transcendent meditation of those who arrive at Thusness. Those lost in a tangle of views, fallen into the darkness of ignorance, I teach in such a way as to lead them out of the tangle of views and the darkness of ignorance. Those who are stupid I teach in such a way that they may acquire transcendent wisdom. Those attached to the realms of desire, form, or formlessness, I teach in such a way that they may escape from the sufferings of the mundane whirl. Those with low aspirations I teach in such a way that they may fulfill the vow of enlightenment. Those intent on their own benefit I teach in such a way that they may fulfill the vow to bring benefit to all beings. Those with weak wills I teach in such a way that they may perfect the transcendent power of enlightening beings. Those in misery I teach in such a way as to enable them to attain the felicity of omniscience. Those who are sick I teach in such a way that they may develop the reflectionlike bodies characteristic of enlightening beings. Those attached to various pleasures I teach in such a way that they may acquire delight in the practices of enlightening beings. Those who are destitute I teach in such a way that they may obtain the spiritual treasury of enlightening beings. Those who resort to parks and gardens I teach in such a way that they are motivated to seek the way to enlightenment. Those who are on the road I teach in such a way that they set out on the road to omniscience. Those in villages I teach in such a way that they may be emancipated from everything in the realms of desire, form, and formlessness. Those in communities I teach in such a way as to lead them beyond the paths of those who strive for individual salvation and set them on the way to buddhahood. Those in cities I teach in such a way as to reveal the city of the supreme truth. Those in the intermediate directions I teach in such a way that they may attain knowledge of the equality of past, present, and future. Those in the four quarters I teach in such a way that they may realize higher knowledge of all things. Those whose behavior is governed solely by lust I teach to stop their craving for all mundane pleasures by means of contemplation of impurity. Those who act on hatred I teach in such a way that they many enter the ocean of universal love. Those who act on delusion I teach in such a way that they may realize higher knowledge with analytic comprehension of all things. Those who act equally on lust, hatred, and delusion I teach in such a way that they may rise above them through the ocean of means of the undertakings of all vehicles of emancipation. Those who are inclined to enjoyment of evanescent mundane objects I teach in such a way as to lead them away from attachment to transient mundane objects. Those who are touched by all the miseries of the mundane whirl I teach in such a way that they may be unaffected by the woes of life and death. Those who are susceptible to guidance by the enlightened I teach in such a way as to elucidate unborn birth. Those who are attached to physical and mental elements I teach in such a way that they may abide in nonreliance. Those who are cowardly I teach in such a way as to reveal the excellence of the adornments of the path of enlightenment. To those who are conceited I elucidate acceptance of the equality of all things. To those who are prone to deceit and guile I explain the purity of intention of enlightening beings.

de ltar rigs kyi bu/ kho mo ni/ sems can thams cad chos kyi sbyin pas yongs su bsdus shing ngan song gi lam gyi rgyud sdug bsngal ba thams cad nas rnam par bzlog pa dang / lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa dang / bde ba yongs su bstan pa dang / khams gsum pa las gyen du bskyed pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rab tu dgod pa dang / thabs sna tshogs kyis yongs su smin par byed byed pas dga' ba chen po'i shugs rgya mtsho snang ba rab tu thob pas dga' zhing spro la yid bde bar gyur pa'o/ /

“In this way I take care of all sentient beings by giving teaching. Leading them away from all miseries and paths leading to unhappiness, showing them the happiness of human and celestial states, freeing them from the dominion of the realms of desire, form, and formlessness, leading them to omniscience, developing them to maturity by various means, I rejoice, exult, become glad at heart, having achieved manifestation of the ocean of energy of great joy.

gzhan yang rigs kyi bu/ kho mo ni/ phyogs dang phyogs mtshams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho la rnam par lta zhing smon lam rgya mtsho la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' lus sna tshogs rnam par dag pa 'od kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs kyi rgyan dang ldan pa/ 'od zer dang 'od kyi dkyil 'khor kha dog mtha' yas pa rab tu 'gyed pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshul rgya mtsho sna tshogs la zhugs pa'i ye shes snang ba can/ ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho sna tshogs la zhugs pa; rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs kyi yul dang ldan pa/ dbyangs kyi yan lag dang / skad rgya mtsho sna tshogs kyi dbyangs dang ldan pa/ rgyan sna tshogs kyis rnam par klubs pa'i lus can/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul sna tshogs la zhugs pa/ zhing rgya mtsho 'byams klas pa sna tshogs su zhugs pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas rgya mtsho sna tshogs la zhugs pa/ tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa rgya mtsho sna tshogs la zhugs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par thar pa dang / ye shes kyi yul sna tshogs kyis snang bar gyur pa/ ye shes rgya mtsho sna tshogs kyi snang ba rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho sna tshogs kyi tshul la rnam par spyod pa/ chos sna tshogs kyi rnam par thar pa'i gzhal med khang rnam par rtse ba'i yul dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sgo sna tshogs le mngon du gnas pa/ chos kyi dbyings sna tshogs kyi nam mkha'i rgyan dang ldan pa/ rgyan sna tshogs kyi sprin gyis nam mkha' rgyas par 'gengs pa/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sna tshogs la rnam par lta ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs nas 'dus pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs 'byams klas par rjes su 'dong ngo/ /phyogs rgya mtsho sna tshogs nas yongs su 'dus pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa tha dad pas bkye ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa tha dad pa'i zhabs kyi drung nas lhags pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs sna tshogs kyi 'khor dang ldan pa/ rgyan sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char rab tu 'bebs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul sna tshogs la zhugs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rgya mtsho sna tshogs la rnam pa spyod pa/ ye shes sna tshogs rgya mtsho la zhugs pa/ rgyan gyi snying po sna tshogs can gyi stan la 'khod pa rnams kyi dga' ba sna tshogs kyi shugs rgya mtsho yongs su bskyed de/ de dag dga' ba sna tshogs kyi shugs rgya mtsho yongs su skyes nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtshor 'dong ste/ de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs tshad med pa rjes su sems pas kyang dga' ba'i shugs chen po rgya mtsho yongs su 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /

“Furthermore, as I observe the oceans of assemblies of enlightening beings in all directions, I generate oceans of energy of various joys in the enlightening beings carrying out various vows, enlightening beings with variously purified bodies, with various auras of light, radiating auras of light beams of infinite colors, illumined by knowledge penetrating oceans of various ways to omniscience, plunged into oceans of various concentrations, manifesting various occult powers, speaking in various languages, variously adorned, plunged into various principles of buddhahood, gone to various lands, seeing various multitudes of buddhas, imbued with oceans of various intellectual capacities, aware of the sphere of knowledge of various liberations of buddhas, encompassing oceans of various knowledges, dwelling in various methods of concentration, freely employing various doctrines, liberations, and disciplines, entering various doors to omniscience, variously adorning the sky of the cosmos, filling the sky with clouds of various supernal manifestations, observing various communities, gathered joyfully in various worlds, gone to various buddha-lands, assembled in various places, sent forth by buddhas, leaving the presence of various buddhas in company with groups of enlightening beings, showering rain from clouds of various adornments, entering into the systems of various buddhas, contemplating the oceans of teachings of various buddhas, plunged into various oceans of knowledge, sitting in the midst of various magnificent arrays. Those enlightening beings, filled with various joys, enter the oceans of assemblies of buddhas, see them, and contemplate them; as they meditate on the infinity of the powers of buddhas, floods of great joy arise in them.

rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang kho mo ni/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi gzugs kyi sku yongs su dag pa mtshan gyis rab tu brgyan pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa mthong nas dga' ba chen po dang / mos shing nyams bde ba rab tu 'thob ste/ sems kyi skad cig re re la'ang 'od kyi dkyil 'khor chos kyi dbyings ltar yangs pa/ kha dog rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med par snang ba la lta zhing / sems kyi skad cig re re la dga' ba chen po'i shugs rgya mtsho rab tu 'thob bo/ /

“Furthermore, perceiving the inconceivable purity of the form body of Vairocana Buddha, adorned by the marks of greatness, I experience exalted joy and serenity. Observing his array of lights, vast as the cosmos, moment to moment manifesting an infinitely varied ocean of colors, in each moment of consciousness I experience floods of great joy.

rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku'i ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang 'od zer chen po sangs rgya kyi zhing mtha' dang dbus med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ste/ 'od zer re re zhing yang 'od zer rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pas chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar mdzad pa mthong zhing sems kyi skad cig re re la dga' ba chen po'i shugs rgya mtsho rab tu 'thob bo/ /

“Also, seeing as many oceans of great beams of light as atoms in infinite buddha-lands emanate from each pore of Vairocana Buddha’s body, each beam of light accompanied by as many oceans of light beams as atoms in infinite buddha-lands, pervading all buddha-universes and extinguishing the suffering of all beings, in each moment of consciousness I experience floods of great joy.

rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbu dang / sku phrag pa gnyis kyi lhun las sems kyi skad cig re re la rin po che thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba'i ri'i sprin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'byung zhing chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa mthong nas dga' ba chen po'i shugs rgya mtsho shin tu yangs pa rab tu 'thob bo/ /

“Also, seeing massive clouds of lights the color of all jewels, as many as atoms in all buddha-lands, emerging from Vairocana’s head moment to moment, pervading all universes, I experience great floods of joy.

rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku'i ba spu'i sgo re re nas sems kyis skad cig re re la kha dog dri zhim po dang / 'od zer sna tshogs can gyi sprin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'byung zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa mthong nas dga' ba chen po'i shugs rgya mtsho shin tu yangs pa rab tu 'thob bo/ /

“Also, seeing multitudes of various fragrant lights, as numerous as atoms in all buddha-lands, emanating from each pore of Vairocana’s body in each moment of thought, I experience great floods of joy.

rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku la rnam par bltas na/ sems kyi skad cig re re la mtshan re re nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs mtshan gyis rab tu brgyan pa'i sprin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ste 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa mthong nas dga' ba chen po'i shugs rgya mtsho shin tu yangs pa rab tu thob bo/ /

“Also, as I observe Vairocana’s body, seeing multitudes of images of Buddha, adorned with the marks of greatness, as numerous as atoms in all buddha-lands, emanating from each of the Buddha’s marks of greatness in each moment of thought, I experience great floods of joy.

rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das rnam pa snang mdzad kyi sku'i dpe byad bzang po re re las sems kyi skad cig re re la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i sku dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus shin tu 'bar ba'i sprin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ste sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par 'gengs shing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i dbyangs su sgrog pa'i 'brug sgra 'byin pa mthong nas dga' ba chen po'i shugs rgya mtsho shin tu yangs pa rab tu 'thob bo/ /

“Also, seeing multitudes of mystically projected bodies of Buddha, shining with the eighty embellishments of greatness, as numerous as atoms in all buddha-lands, emanating from each of the Buddha’s physical embellishments in each moment of thought, I experience great floods of joy.

rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku la rnam par bltas nas/ sems kyi skad cig re re la ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa'i sku dang po byang chub tu thugs bskyed pa dang bcas/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam rnam par dag pa'i rgyan dang bcas/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su gnon pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'byung ba mthong nas dga' ba chen po'i shugs rgya mtsho shin tu yangs pa rab tu 'thob bo/ /

“Also, as I observe Vairocana’s body, seeing multitudes of Buddha’s spiritual manifestations, as numerous as atoms in untold buddha-lands, emanate from each pore in each moment of thought, including manifestations of the Buddha’s first inspiration, purification of the six transcendent ways, and progress through the stages of enlightenment, I experience great floods of joy.

rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku las sems kyi skad cig re re la lha'i dbang po'i lus kyi sprin/ lha'i dbang po'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung zhing 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par bkang ste lha'i dbang po'i lus yongs su bstan pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la mngon du gnas shing chos ston pa mthong nas dga' ba chen po'i shugs rgya mtsho shin tu yangs pa rab tu 'thob bo/ /

“Also, as I watch Vairocana’s body, seeing multitudes of all kinds of beings, celestial, preternatural, and human, as numerous as atoms in untold buddha-lands, emanating from each of Vairocana’s pores in each moment of thought, along with their characteristic atmospheres of projected auras, going throughout all worlds, appearing to those sentient beings who are suited to being guided by manifestations of such and such particular forms of being, and expounding the Teaching to them, I experience great floods of joy.

rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku las sems kyi skad cig re re la klu'i dbang po'i lus kyi sprin/ klu'i dbang po'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung zhing 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par bkang ste klu'i dbang po'i lus yongs su bstan pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la mngon du gnas shing chos ston pa mthong nas dga' ba chen po'i shugs rgya mtsho shin tu yangs pa rab tu 'thob bo/ /

rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku la rnam par bltas na/ sems kyi skad cig re re la ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas gnod sbyin gyi dbang po'i lus kyi sprin/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang po'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung zhing chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par bkang ste gnod sbyin gyi lus yongs su bstan pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la mngon du gnas shing chos ston pa mthong nas dga' ba chen po'i shugs rgya mtsho shin tu yangs pa rab tu 'thob bo/ /

rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku la rnam par bltas na/ sems kyi skad cig re re la ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas dri za'i dbang po'i lus kyi sprin/ dri za'i dbang po'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung zhing chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par bkang ste dri za'i dbang po'i lus yongs su bstan pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la mngon du gnas shing chos ston pa mthong nas dga' ba chen po'i shugs rgya mtsho shin tu yangs pa rab tu 'thob bo/ /

rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku la rnam par bltas na/ sems kyi skad cig re re la ba spu'i sgo re re nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po'i lus kyi sprin; lha ma yin gyi dbang po'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung zhing 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par bkang ste lha ma yin gyi dbang po'i lus yongs su bstan pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la mngon par gnas shing chos ston pa mthong nas dga' ba chen po'i shugs rgya mtsho shin tu yangs pa rab tu 'thob bo/ /

rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku la rnam par bltas na/ sems kyi skad cig re re la ba spu'i sgo re re nas nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'i lus kyi sprin/ nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'i rnam pa 'phrul ba dang bcas pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung zhing 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par bkang ste nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'i lus yongs su bstan pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la mngon du gnas shing chos ston pa mthong nas dga' ba chen po'i shugs rgya mtsho shin tu yangs pa rab tu 'thob bo/ /

gzhan yang rigs kyi bu/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku la rnam par bltas na/ sems kyi skad cig re re la ba spu'i sgo re re nas mi 'am ci'i dbang po'i lus kyi sprin/ mi 'am ci'i dbang po'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung zhing chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par bkang ste mi 'am ci'i dbang po'i lus yongs su bstan pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la mngon du gnas shing chos ston pa mthong nas dga' ba chen po'i shugs rgya mtsho shin tu yangs pa rab tu 'thob bo; ;

rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku la rnam par bltas na/ sems kyi skad cig re re la ba spu'i sgo re re nas lto 'phye chen po'i lus kyi sprin/ lto 'phye chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung zhing chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par bkang ste lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po'i lus yongs su bstan pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la mngon du gnas shing chos ston pa mthong nas dga' ba chen po'i shugs rgya mtsho shin tu yangs pa rab tu 'thob bo/ /

rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku la rnam pa bltas na/ sems kyi skad cig re re la ba spu'i sgo re re nas mi'i dbang po'i lus kyi sprin/ mi'i dbang po'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung zhing chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par bkang ste mi'i dbang po'i lus yongs su bstan pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la mngon du gnas shing chos ston pa mthong nas dga' ba chen po'i shugs rgya mtsho shin tu yangs pa rab tu 'thob bo/ /

rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das rnam pa snang mdzad kyi sku la rnam par bltas na/ sems kyi skad cig re re la ba spu'i sgo re re nas tshangs pa'i dbang po'i lus kyi sprin/ tshangs pa'i dbang po'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i yul dang bcas pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung zhing chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par bkang ste tshangs pa'i dbang po'i lus yongs su bstan pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la mngon du gnas shing tshangs pa'i sgra skad dang / dbyangs kyis chos ston pa mthong nas sems kyi skad cig re re la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i dga' ba chen po'i shugs rgya mtsho chos kyi dbyings ltar rgya che zhing shin tu yangs pa rab tu 'thob ste/

“And as I watch Vairocana’s body, seeing multitudes of Brahma gods, as numerous as atoms in untold buddha-lands, emanating from each pore in each moment of thought, along with the miraculous projections of Brahma gods, appearing to sentient beings in all universes who are suited to being guided by manifestations in the form of Brahma gods and expounding the Teaching to them with the voice of Brahma, in each moment of awareness I experience great floods of joy of cosmic dimensions concomitant with all-knowledge.

sngon thob par gyur pa 'thob par 'gyur ba ma yin no/ /sngon khong du chud pa khong du chud par 'gyur ba ma yin no/ /sngon zhugs pa la 'jug par 'gyur ba ma yin no/ /sngon khyab par gyur pa khyab par 'gyur ba ma yin no/ /sngon mthong ba mthong bar 'gyur ba ma yin no/ /sngon thos pa thos par 'gyur ba ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos kyi rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid yongs su shes pa ltar na/ chos thams cad mtshan nyid gcig pa'ang ci rob ma yin te/ dus gsum gyi tshul 'jug pa'i sgor zhugs na/ chos thams cad kyang mtha' dang dbus med par bstan du yod pa ste/

“And so I attain what I have never attained before, understand what I have never understood before, penetrate what I have never penetrated before, pervade what I have never pervaded before, see what I have never seen before, and hear what I have never heard before. Why? All things are to be completely known by the nature of things as being of one characteristic at all times, while yet manifest in an endless variety as all things.

'di ni/ rigs kyi bu; byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i tshul dga' ba yangs pa'i shugs 'byung bas sems kyi skad cig rnam par brgyan pa'i tshul rgya mtsho'i snang ba ste/ rigs kyi bu; rnam par thar pa 'di ni/ chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i phyir mtha' dang dbus med pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa 'di ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa dang tha mi dad pas zad mi shes pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi mig gis rnam par shes par bya ba yin pas mu med pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa 'di ni/ chos kyi dbyings tha mi dad pa'i tshul gyis gtan du rgyas par 'gengs pas gting med ba'o/ /rnam par thar pa 'di ni/ dmigs pa gcig tu rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad yongs su 'du bar byed pas sgo thams cad dang ldan pa'i/ /rnam par thar pa 'di ni/ chos thams cad kyi lus dang mi gnyis par spyod pas don yod pa'o; ;rnam par thar pa 'di ni/ sgyu ma lta bur yongs su spyod pas ma skyes pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa 'di ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi smon lam gyi gzugs brnyan du byung bas gzugs brnyan lta bu'o/ /rnam par thar pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas shin tu sprul pa'i phyir sprul pa lta bu'o/ /rnam par thar pa 'di ni/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi rten du gyur pas sa chen po lta bu'o/ /rnam par thar pa 'di ni/ 'gro ba thams cad snying rje chen pos mngon par rlan par byed pas chu'i phung po lta bu'o/ /rnam par thar pa 'di ni; sems can thams cad kyi sred pa'i rlan yongs su skem pas me'i phung po lta bu'o/ /rnam pa thar pa 'di ni/ sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du rab tu ston pa'i phyir rlung gi phung po lta bu'o/ /rnam par thar pa 'di ni/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyan gyi gzhi yin pas rgya mtsho lta bu'o// rnam par thar pa 'di ni/ chos thams cad kyi ye shes rin po che rgya mtsho las mngon par 'phags pas ri rab ri'i rgyal po lta bu'o/ /rnam par thar pa 'di ni/ chos thams cad kyi rnam par thar pa'i gzhal med khang rnam par skyod pa'i phyir rnam par skyod pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor lta bu'o/ /rnam par thar pa 'di ni/ dus gsum du byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad kyi go 'byed pas nam mkha' lta bu'o/ /rnam par thar pa 'di ni/ sems can thams cad la chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon du 'bebs pas sprin chen po lta bu'o/ /rnam par thar pa 'di ni/ sems can thams cad kyi mi shes pa'i mun nag rnam par sel pas nyi ma lta bu'o; ;rnam par thar pa 'di ni/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi rgya mtsho chen pos shin tu sgrub pa'i phyir zla ba lta bu'o/ /rnam par thar pa 'di ni/ thams cad du song ba'i phyir de bzhin nyid lta bu'o/ /rnam par thar pa 'di ni/ las kyi chos kyis shin tu sprul pa'i phyir rang gi grib ma lta bu'o/ /rnam par thar pa 'di ni/ sems can gyi mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos kyi sgra rab tu sgrog pas brag ca lta bu'o/ /rnam par thar pa 'di ni/ bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can thams cad kyis rnam par dmigs par byed pa'i phyir gzugs brnyan lta bu'o/ /rnam par thar pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i me tog shin tu rgyas pa'i phyir shing gi rgyal po lta bu'o/ /rnam par thar pa 'di ni/ mi shigs pa'i chos can yin pas rdo rje lta bu'o/ /rnam par thar pa 'di ni/ rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' dang dbus med pa rgya mtsho mngon par sgrub pas nor bu yid bzhin rin po che'i rgyal po lta bu'o/ /rnam par thar pa 'di ni/ dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rnam par dmigs par bya ba la sgrib pa med pas rin po che'i rgyal po dri ma med pa'i snying po lta bu'o/ /rnam par thar pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo mnyam pa nyid du sgrog pas nor bu rin po che dga' ba'i rgyal mtshan lta bu ste/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa dga' ba yangs pa'i shugs shin tu yangs pa 'byung bas sems kyi skad cig rnam par brgyan pa 'di ni/ dpe tshad med pa rnam par dgod pa'i rjes su 'brang bas bstan par bya'o/ /

“This is the range of the ocean of means of the enlightening liberation of supernal manifestations of a moment of thought producing immense floods of joy. This liberation is infinite because it goes into the ocean of principles of the cosmos. This liberation is inexhaustible because it is inseparable from the determination for omniscience. This liberation is endless because it is perceived by the eye of enlightening beings. This liberation is peerless, because it pervades the total cosmos. This liberation is all-sided, because it encompasses all miracles in a single object. This liberation is unfailing, because of practicing the nonduality of all bodies of reality. This liberation is unborn, because its practice is like magic. This liberation is like a reflection, because it arises as a reflection of the vow for omniscience. This liberation is like an emanation, because it emanates the practices of enlightening beings. This liberation is like earth, because it is the refuge of all sentient beings. This liberation is like water, because it rains great compassion on all sentient beings. This liberation is like fire, because it ends the cravings of all sentient beings. This liberation is like wind, because it directs all sentient beings to omniscience. This liberation is like the ocean, because it is a repository of ornaments of virtues for all sentient beings. This liberation is like the polar mountain, because it rises out of the ocean of jewels of knowledge of all things. This liberation is like the sky, being the space in which the miracles of the buddhas of past, present, and future take place. This liberation is like a great cloud, showering the rain of the cloud of the Teaching on all sentient beings. This liberation is like the sun, dispelling the darkness of nescience of all sentient beings. This liberation is like the moon, imbued with an ocean of goodness and knowledge. This liberation is like arrival at Thusness, reaching everywhere. This liberation is like one’s own reflection, being produced by rightness of action. This liberation is like an echo, thundering the voice of all truths in accord with inclinations. This liberation is like a reflection, communicating to all sentient beings according to their mentalities. This liberation is like a great tree, flowering with the miracles of all buddhas. This liberation is like diamond, its nature unbreakable. This liberation is like a wish-fulfilling jewel, accomplishing an endless variety of miracles. This liberation is like a flawless jewel, showing the miracles of the buddhas of past, present, and future without interference. This liberation is like a jewel of happiness, equally producing the voice of the teachings of all buddhas. This liberation is illustrated by countless such similes.”

de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis mtshan mo'i lha mo sgra rgya mtsho rab tu zhi pa dang ldan pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags ma lha mo/ ji ltar nan tan du bgyis na/ byang chub sems dpas de lta bu'i rnam par thar pa de yongs su 'grub par 'gyur/
Then Sudhana asked the night goddess, “How did you manage to attain such a liberation?”

smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshogs chen po chos yangs pa dang ldan pa/ rnam par rgya chen po/ gsal ba chen po/ snang ba chen po/ 'od chen po/ byin chen po/ rnam par dbye ba chen po/ 'byung ba chen po/ phun sum tshogs pa chen po ste/ de dag la nan tan du byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rnam par thar pa 'di lta bu phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba dag go/

She replied, “There are ten great provisions of enlightening beings, great accomplishments, great encompassing practices, great illuminations, great manifestations of power, great good fortunes, great heritages, great capacities, great powers, by the practice of which enlightening beings attain this liberation.

bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa sems can rgya mtsho thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su tshim par byed pa la zhugs pa ni/ rgya chen po'i chos so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i nan tan la zhugs pa ni/ rgya chen po'i chos so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin nges par rtogs par bya ba la zhugs pa ni/ rgya chen po'i chos so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yang dag par brtsams pa las phyir mi ldog pa la zhugs pa ni/ rgya chen po'i chos so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba rab tu zhi bar bya ba la zhugs pa ni/ rgya chen po'i chos so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab chos rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su shes par bya ba la zhugs pa ni/ rgya chen po'i chos so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i thabs sems can rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang gdul ba la zhugs pa ni/ rgya chen po'i chos so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal par sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad pa'i phyir zhing rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa ni/ rgya chen po'i chos so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i stobs sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du skad cig re re la mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yongs su bstan pa rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa ni/ rgya chen po'i chos so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes dus gsum gyi chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs la zhugs pa ni/ rgya chen po'i chos so/ /

What are the ten? Enlightening beings’ great encompassing practice of giving, devoted to satisfying all sentient beings according to their wishes; enlightening beings’ great encompassing practice of appropriate conduct, devoted to embodying the virtues of all buddhas; enlightening beings’ great encompassing practice of forbearance, devoted to contemplating the nature of all things; enlightening beings’ great encompassing practice of vigor, devoted to undertaking the attainment of omniscience without turning back; enlightening beings’ great encompassing practice of meditation, devoted to extinguishing the fire of afflictions of all sentient beings; enlightening beings’ great encompassing practice of wisdom, devoted to higher knowledge of all things; enlightening beings’ great encompassing practice of skill in means, devoted to guiding all sentient beings to perfection; enlightening beings’ great encompassing practice of vows, going to all lands to go into the practice of enlightening beings for all time in all lands; enlightening beings’ great encompassing practice of power, going to all universes to ceaselessly manifest realization of enlightenment in each instant in all lands; enlightening beings’ great encompassing practice of knowledge, intent upon the powers of all buddha-lands in those oceans of structures of all realms of reality.

rigs kyi bu/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgya chen po'i chos tshogs chen po dang ldan pa rnams te/ de dag la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rnam par thar pa de lta bu phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/ /rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /yongs su 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /yang dag par 'phel bar 'gyur ro; ;kun nas 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rab tu skye bar 'gyur ro/ /yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /shin tu brtan par 'gyur ro/ /rnam par yangs par 'gyur ro/ / yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /yongs su gnas par 'gyur ro/ /nor bzang gis smras pa/ 'phags ma lha mo/ khyod yun ring po ji srid cig nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs/ des smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi me tog gi snying po'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa 'di'i shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho stong phrag bcu 'das pa'i pha rol na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rin po che thams cad kyis dri ma med pa'i 'od du rnam par brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod do/ /de'i dbus na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od dang / smon lam gyi dbyangs zhes bya ba yod do; ;de'i dbus na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che thams cad kyi sprin sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten gyi 'og gi mtshams nas rin po che thams cad kyi phreng ba'i dra ba rgya mtshos brtan pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po spos kyi rdo rje thams cad kyi rgyan gyi lhun dang ldan pa/ khang pa brtsegs pa rgya'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/ rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa; lha rdzas kyi gzhal med khang dang gnas kyi sprin gyis kun tu gang ba/ gser ltar dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi rgyan ces bya ba yod pa der bskal pa kun tu snang ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba byung ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams de na snying po byang chub rin po che thams cad kyi snying po 'od sna tshogs can zhes bya ba yod de/ der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phyir mi ldog pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi dbyangs zhes bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas te/
de'i tshe de'i dus na kho mo yang snying po byang chub kyi lha mo bsod nams sgron ma phun sum tshogs pa kun nas dpal gyi 'od ces bya ba zhig tu gyur te/ byang chub kyi shing de la 'dug 'dug nas der kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa de mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa mthong nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong nas kyang kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo/ / de'i 'og tu 'jig rten gyi khams de nyid kyi rgyal po'i gnas kun nas yongs su rgyas pa'i dpal gyi snying po zhes bya bar snying po byang chub de nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sdong po ri bo gzi brjid ces bya ba mngon par sangs rgyas so/ / kho mos ni/ de nas shi 'phos te snying po byang chub de nyid du ye shes phun sum tshogs pa'i bsod nams 'od ces bya ba'i mtshan mo'i lha mo zhig tu gyur cing 'dug 'dug ste/ kho mos der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sdong po ri bo gzi brjid des chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa mthong nas 'gro ba thams cad du yongs su ston pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyi 'od kyi yul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo/ / de'i 'og tu kho mos snying po byang chub de nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rgya mtsho thams cad kyi gsung gi rgyal po zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong ma thag tu chos thams cad kyi yang dag par 'phel bar byed pa'i gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo/ / de'i 'og tu kho mos snying po byang chub de nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i 'od zer sgron ma'i rgyal mtshan rgyal po zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong ma thag tu kho mos sangs rgyas rgya mtsho rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo/ / de'i 'og tu kho mos snying po byang chub de nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sprin sgra'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong ma thag tu kho mos chos rgya mtsho thams cad kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo/ / de'i 'og tu kho mo lha'i bu mo zhig tu gyur te snying po byang chub de nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes skar mda' snang ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong ma thag tu kho mos sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rab tu zhi par byed pa'i sgron ma snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo/ /
de'i 'og tu kho mos snying po byang chub de nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa chos rnam par 'phrul pa'i shugs kyi rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong ma thag tu kho mos dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang dag par 'jug pa'i snying po'i snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo/ / de'i 'og tu kho mos snying po byang chub de nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sgron ma ye shes kyi rnam par gnon pa zhes bya ba bsnyen bkur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du ye shes thogs pa med pa'i 'khor lo snang ba'i gzi brjid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo/ /
de'i 'og tu kho mos snying po byang chub de nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi stobs kyi ri bo gzi brjid ces bya ba bsnyen bkur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong ma thag tu kho mos dus gsum gyi sems can gyi spyod pa dang / dbang po rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo; ;rigs kyi bu/ de ltar kho mos 'jig rten gyi khams gser ltar dri ma med pa'i 'od der bskal pa kun tu snang ba'i rgyal mtshan la de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig bsnyen bkur te/ la la ni/ lha'i dbang por gyur te bsnyen bkur to/ /la la ni/ klu'i dbang por gyur te bsnyen bkur to; ;la la ni/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang por gyur pas/ la la ni/ dri za'i dbang por gyur pas/ la la ni/ lha ma yin gyi dbang por gyur pas/ la la ni/ nam mkha' lding gi dbang por gyur pas/ la la ni/ mi 'am ci'i dbang por gyur pas/ la la ni/ lto 'phye chen po'i dbang por gyur pas/ la la ni/ mi'i dbang por gyur pas/ la la ni/ tshangs pa'i dbang por gyur pas/ la la ni/ lhar gyur pas/ la la ni/ mir gyur pas/ la la ni/ bud med du gyur pas/ la la ni/ skyes par gyur pas/ la la ni/ khye'ur gyur pas/ la la ni/ bu mor gyur pas bsnyen bkur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyang kho mos mched pa'i yo byad ci bdog pas mchod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyang rim gror byas so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi chos bstan pa yang thos so/ /
de nas kho mo shi 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams de nyid du bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig tu byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad do/ /
de nas shi 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa 'di'i 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du skyes te/ kho mos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa log par dad sel bsnyen bkur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong ma thag tu kho mos mun pa'i rdul thams cad dang bral bas rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo/ /
de'i 'og tu kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub bsnyen bkur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong ma thag tu kho mos zhing rgya mtsho thams cad snang ba rjes su 'phro bar bya bas rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo/ /
de'i 'og tu kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa bsod skyabs bsnyen bkur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong ma thag tu kho mos sems can thams cad kyi skad rgya mtsho 'brug sgra sgrog pa'i sgra dbyangs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo/ /
de'i 'og tu kho mos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad 'di bsnyen bkur te/ de snying po byang chub la de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgo rgya mtsho sems kyi skad cig re re la yongs su ston pa mdzad pa mthong nas kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa dga' ba yangs pa'i shugs 'byung bas sems kyi skad cig rnam par brgyan pa 'di thob bo/ /de thob ma thag tu chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la zhugs par gyur to/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho de dag thams cad du gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed pa de dag la rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba re re la yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing la zhugs te mthong bar gyur to/ /

sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad las sangs rgyas kyi zhing re re na yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad snying po byang chub tu gshegs te sems kyi skad cig re re la mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su ston par mdzad cing / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa re res kyang chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho rgyas par 'gengs pa mdzad pa mthong ngo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad las de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i zhabs kyi drung na yang bdag mngon du 'dug par shes par gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu de bzhin gshegs pa snying po byang chub la bzhugs pa de dag gis chos bstan pa de dag thams cad kyang thos par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas sprul pa rgya mtsho byung ste chos kyi sprin rgya mtsho rab tu sgrog pa dang / rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs yongs su ston pa mdzad cing / chos kyi dbyings kyi phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad du gtogs pa'i zhing rgya mtsho thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa thams cad kyi sems can 'byams klas pa thams cad 'gro ba'i rgyud sna tshogs su skyes pa dag gi nang na sems can gyi bsam pa'i dbang du 'du shes kyi rnam pa sna tshogs kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba de dag thams cad kyang yongs su 'dzin to/ /khong du chud par byed do/ /nges par rtogs par byed do/ /don dang / tshig dang / yi ge 'dzin pa'i shugs kyis rnam par gnon pa'i gzungs kyi mthus yongs su 'dzin to/ /chos kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par dag pa'i snying po khong du chud pa'i shes rab kyis yongs su sbyong ngo/ / chos rgya mtsho thams cad rnam par 'byed pa la mkhas pa'i rigs pas khong du chud par byed do/ /dus gsum ltar rnam par yangs pa'i blos rgyas par 'gengs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dang mnyam 'khor gyis yongs su gzhog par byed do/ /

And in each of those buddha-lands I see Vairocana Buddha at the pinnacle of enlightenment manifesting the miracle of perfect enlightenment in each moment of consciousness, pervading the oceans of structures of all reality realms with each miraculous display of enlightenment. I also perceive myself in the presence of each of those buddhas and listen to what the buddhas in those worlds teach. And as multitudes of emanations of all those buddhas come forth from all their pores, proclaiming myriad teachings and showing various miracles, and turn the wheel of teaching in all realms by mastery of sentient beings’ minds, using various ideas, I remember, apply, and contemplate it all. I pick it up by mental command, able to swiftly grasp all meanings and expressions, clarify it by wisdom penetrating the inner sanctum of purity of all realities, follow its course by higher knowledge investigating the ocean of all realities, encompass it by awareness as vast as past, present, and future, balance it by wisdom conforming to the equality of those who arrive at Thusness. I carry out all the principles of the Teaching, I bring forth multitudes of scriptures from all the clouds of teaching, I arrange oceans of doctrines in all the multitudes of scriptures, I gather cycles of doctrine in all the oceans of doctrines, I find oceanic floods of spiritual joy in all the waves of doctrine, I produce momentum in attainment of the stages of enlightenment in all the oceans of spiritual joy, I produce momentum in attainment of oceans of concentration in the momentum through all the stages, I attain oceans of visions of buddhas in all the multitudes of oceans of concentration, I attain oceans of awareness in all the oceans of visions of buddhas, I order the stages of knowledges of past, present, and future in all the oceans of awareness;

phyogs rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa rgyas par dgang ba'i tshul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi mtha'i spyod pa rgya mtsho tshad med pa la 'jug pa'i tshul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho tshad med pa'i ye shes snang ba'i tshul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dka' ba tshad med pa yongs su btang ba'i ye shes snang ba rab tu thob par bya ba'i tshul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims kyi dkyil 'khor tshad med pa yongs su dag pa snang bar bya ba'i tshul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bzod pa'i sa tshad med pa yongs su sbyang ba'i tshul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i brtson 'grus chen po'i shugs tshad med pa rnam par 'phel bar bya ba'i mthu'i ye shes snang ba rab tu thob par bya ba'i tshul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gtan gyi dkyil 'khor dang / bsam gtan de skad du khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa dga' ba yangs pa'i shugs 'byung bas sems kyi skad cig rnam par brgyan pa 'di thob nas ji srid cig lon zhes zer ba ni/ de ltar kho mos bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gnyis kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gser ltar dri ma med pa'i 'od du byang chub kyi shing gi lha mo bsod nams sgron ma phun sum tshogs pa kun nas dpal gyi 'od ces bya bar gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa phyir mi ldog pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyis chos bstan pa thos nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gnyis kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag tu byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad nas mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir skyes te/ log par dad sel la sogs pa tha ma shAkya thub pa'i bar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa bskal pa bzang po pa dag kyang bsnyen bkur te/ ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang bsnyen bkur ro/ /'jig rten gyi khams 'dir ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du'ang sangs rgyas kyi rgyud ma byon pa rnams yongs su bsnyen cing bkur ro/ /mchod do/ /rigs kyi bu/ da dung du'ang 'jig rten gyi khams gser ltar dri ma med pa'i 'od de yang yod la/ sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyang rgyun ma chad kyi/ de bas na/ rigs kyi bu/ tshul 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par gnon pa chen pos brtson par gyis shig /

“If you ask also how long ago I attained this enlightening liberation of supernal manifestations in a moment of thought producing great floods of joy, when I was an enlightenment tree goddess named Exemplary Light Serving As a Beacon of Good in the world Pure Golden Radiance as many eons ago as atoms in a buddha-land, I first aspired to enlightenment on hearing the teaching of the buddha Unremitting Voice of the Reality Realm, and after having carried out the practice of enlightening beings for as many eons as atoms in a buddha-land, I was born in this world and propitiated the buddhas of the eon of Virtue from Krakucchanda to Shakyamuni. And I will propitiate and honor all the buddhas yet to come, in this world and in all worlds. Even now that world of Pure Golden Radiance still exists, and the lineage of the buddhas there is unbroken. So you should apply yourself to this doctrine with the great strength of enlightening being.”

de nas mtshan mo'i lha mo sgra rgya mtsho rab tu zhi ba dang ldan pas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa dga' ba yangs pa'i shugs 'byung bas sems kyi skad cig rnam par brgyan pa 'di nyid brnan te bstan par bya ba'i phyir tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la tshigs su bcad de smras pa;
Then the goddess further explained her liberation to Sudhana in verse:

rnam thar dge 'di ji ltar thob gyur pa/ / kho mo'i tshig 'di nor bzang khyod nyon cig / thos nas dga' ba'i stobs kyang yongs bskyed de/ / rnam thar tshul 'di la ni 'jug par gyis/ /
bdag gi sems dang bsam pa yongs sbyong zhing / / mos pa'i shugs yangs yongs su bskyed byas te/ / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes grong 'dun pas; ; bskal pa rgya mtsho mang por sngon spyad do/ /
bde gshegs dus gsum byung ba thos nas kyang / / de dag kun la mos pa yangs bskyed do/ / bskal pa brgya phrag mang por sgo kun tu/ / de dag 'khor dang bcas par kho mos bkur/ /
sngon gyi bde gshegs kho mos mthong gyur nas/ / 'gro la phan phyir yun ring mchod byas te/ / spro ba'i stobs ni rnam yangs yongs bskyed nas/ / bdag gis gdung ba med pa'i chos kyang thos/ /
rnam par thar pa 'di la 'jug pa na/ / pha dang ma dang bla ma'i skye bo la/ / de tshe bdag gis phan bdes bsti stang byas/ / bsnyen bkur sri zhur gnas pa kun kyang byas/ /
rgas pa nad pa nor med mi rnams dang / / dbang po ma tshang sdug bsngal mgon med pa/ / mang po bdag gis byams sems bde bkod nas/ / tshe rabs brgyar yang nor phyug mgon yod byas/ /
rgyal po me dang rkun chom rkyen gyur dang / / seng+ge glang po pha rol dgras 'jigs dang / / srid pa'i rgya mtsho'i 'jigs dngos sna tshogs las/ / sngon tshe spyod pa'i dus na bdag gis bskyabs/ /
rtag tu srid gsum nyon mongs gdungs gyur te/ / las kyis rab gdungs de bzhin mi dge bas/ / 'khor ba'i ri gzar g.yang du lhung ba yi/ / skye bo 'gro ba'i rgyud du bdag gis bskyabs/ /
sdug bsngal ngan song g.yang sas 'jigs pa dag / rtag tu mi bde shin tu mi bzad dang / / skye rga na zhing 'chi ba'i 'jigs mang kun/ / bdag gis 'jig rten spyod tshe zhi bar byas/ /
'khor ba'i sdug bsngal zhi bar bya ba dang / / sems can kun gyi bde ba yongs bskyed cing / / sangs rgyas bde ba dam pa bskyed pa ni/ / bskal pa phyi mar kho mo'i smon lam mo; ;

Listen to me tell, O Sudhana, How I attained this pure liberation.
Hearing this and generating the power of joy, Enter this way of liberation.
I practiced for many eons past And purified my mind; Generating great momentum of zealous application, I came into the presence of the citadel of omniscience.
Hearing of the buddhas, supreme in all times, And developing great faith in them, I served them and their retinues for hundreds of eons With all that is pleasing.
Seeing the buddhas of the past, I honored them for the benefit of all beings; And I heard their incomparable teaching, Generating immense power of joy.
I always paid respect to my parents and elders, Taking pleasure in their welfare; I served them and honored them, While entering this liberation.
Many people who were old, infirm, poor, Handicapped, suffering, helpless, I made happy, rich, and protected, Over hundreds of lifetimes.
In my past practice I rescued those In the sea of existence from various perils— From the perils of kings and robbers, Fire and water, wild beasts and enemies.
I saved those always burning with afflictions in the world, Made that way by impure deeds, In dangerous straits in the mundane whirl, Born in the paths of existence.
The terrors of the calamities in the woeful states of misery Are harsh and violent, continuous and manifold; The terrors of birth, old age, death and sickness in the world I put an end to entirely.
Stilling the intense pains of the mundane world, Producing all happiness in sentient beings, Producing the ultimate bliss of the enlightened, For endless eons—this is my vow.

rigs kyi bu/ kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa dga' ba yangs pa'i shugs 'byung bas sems kyi skad cig rnam par brgyan pa 'di shes par zad na; kho mos byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa/ phyi nang gi sdug bsngal ma lus pa las rnam par grol ba/ bskal pa'i ming du bya ba thams cad shes par gyur pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad 'byung ba dang / 'jig pa'i rgyus la mkhas pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu/ snying po byang chub 'di nyid na bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na mtshan mo'i lha mo grong khyer thams cad srung ba 'byung ba'i gzi brjid dpal zhes bya ba 'dug gi /de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /

“I only know this enlightening liberation of supernal manifestations in a moment of thought producing vast floods of joy—how can I know the practice or tell the virtues of the enlightening beings who have plunged into the ocean of all principles of the cosmos of reality, who are freed from all internal and external suffering, who know all eons are in the thoughts, who are versed in the knowledge of the becoming and dissolution of all worlds?
“At this same enlightenment site, in the circle of Vairocana Buddha, is a night goddess named Sarvanagararakshasambhavatejahshri—go ask her how an enlightening being is to learn and carry out the practice of enlightening beings.”
de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis mtshan mo'i lha mo sgra rgya mtsho rab tu zhi ba dang ldan pa la tshul dang 'dra pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /
Then Sudhana spoke these verses to the night goddess Prashantarutasagaravati:

dge ba'i bshes kyis ma nor mthun bstan pas/ / lha mo khyod kyi drung du nye bar mchis/ / mtha' dang dbus mi mnga' ba'i sku tshul du; ; khyod ni gdan la bzhugs pa bdag gis mthong / /
kha dog dbyibs dang mtshan ma'i spyod yul ba/ / srid la gnas dang dngos por 'du shes dang / / 'du shes dma' dang log par lta ba yis/ / khyod kyi spyod yul 'tshal bar mi nus so/ /
khyod kyi sku gzugs blta na mtha' yas pas/ / khyod kyi sku gzugs mdog gi mtshan min/ / bskal pa mtha' yas dag tu yongs brtags kyang / / lha dang 'jig rten bcas pas shes mi nus/ /
lha mo khyod ni phung po'i gnas las 'phags/ / skye mched rnams la'ang de bzhin mi gnas te/ / 'jig rten rnam par 'das pas the tshom bral/ / 'jig rten dag tu rnam par 'phrul ba mdzad/ /
g.yo ba mi mnga' skyon bral chags pa med/ / khyod kyis ye shes spyan ni rnam sbyangs pas/ / rdul gyi go la thams cad rdul tshad du/ / sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa mang po gzigs/ /
khyod kyi sku ni chos sku'i snying po can; ; khyod kyi thugs kyang ye shes chags pa med/ / khyod ni kun tu 'od kyis snang mdzad pas/ / 'jig rten skye bo rnams la mtha' yas snang / /
sems las mtha' yas las rnams yongs su 'byung / / 'jig rten thams cad las kyis rnam par bris/ / 'gro ba sems kyi dngos su mkhyen gyur pas/ / rang gi sku yang 'gro ba snyed du bstan; ;
'jig rten du ni rmi lam 'drar mkhyen nas/ / sangs rgyas kun kyang gzugs brnyan lta bu dang / / ma lus chos rnams sgra brnyan 'drar mkhyen pas/ / chags pa mi mnga' 'gro ba kun tu spyod/ /
dus gsum gnas pa'i 'gro ba thams cad la/ / skad cig re rer rang gi sku ston kyang / / khyod kyi thugs la gnyis su mi rgyu ste/ / phyogs rnams kun tu chos kyang rab tu bstan/ /
rdul la 'gro ba rgya mtsho mtha' yas dang / / de bzhin sems can mtsho chen dpag yas dang / / mtha' dbus med pa'i bde gshegs gang chen mtsho/ / kun kyang khyod kyi rnam thar dam pa'i yul/ /

Instructed by a spiritual benefactor, I came to you, O goddess; I see you sitting on your seat Of infinite height.
Those whose minds are on appearances, Who cling to existence or conceptualize being, And the low-minded with false views, Cannot know this realm of yours.
No worldly or celestial beings can know The features of your appearance and form, Even if they look for endless eons— So endless is the sight of your form.
You are free from dependence on the body-mind clusters, And you do not rest on the sense media either; Gone beyond the world and transcended desire, You appear in the world, transforming.
You have attained immovability, faultless and unattached, You have clarified the eye of higher knowledge; In every atom you see as many buddhas as all atoms Magically transforming.
Your body contains the body of truth, Your mind is made of knowledge, unhindered.
Illumined by universal light, You produce endless light in the world.
You produce endless deeds from the mind, So all worlds are adorned by your deeds; Knowing that worlds are mental in nature, Your manifest yourself in bodies Equal to beings.
Knowing this world is like a dream And all buddhas are like reflections And all phenomena like echoes, You live in the world without clinging to anything.
In each moment you show yourself To the beings of past, present, and future, Yet there is no inclination to dualism in your mind, And thus do you expound the Teaching in all realms.
The oceans of beings are as infinite As the endless oceans of atoms, And infinite too are the oceans of Buddha— All are the sphere of your practice of liberation.

de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis mtshan mo'i lha mo sgra rgya mtsho rab tu zhi ba dang ldan pa la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod de lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te mtshan mo'i lha mo sgra rgya mtsho rab tu zhi ba dang ldan pa'i drung nas song ngo/ /
Then Sudhana paid his respects to the night goddess and left her.
shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ sdong pos brgyan pa'i le'u ste// ` // bam po brgya gnyis pa/
