Having heard the name of the enlightening being Universally Good, his practice of enlightenment, the excellence of his vow, the excellence of basing his undertaking on the provisions for enlightenment, the excellence of his expertise in accomplishment, his conduct in the stage of universal good, his preparations for the stages, the excellence of his attainment, the speed of his attainment of the stages, his entry into the stages, his stabilization in the stages, his progress through the stages, his importance in the stages, his mastery of the stages, and his abiding in the stages, Sudhana, eager to see the enlightening being Samantabhadra, Universally Good, sat on a lotus seat of jewels facing the lionthrone of the Buddha on the enlightenment site there filled with oceans of diamonds, with a mind as vast as space and free from all attachments, with perception of all lands well developed, with a mind having transcended all barriers and clingings, with a mind unimpeded, in the realm of nonobstruction in the midst of all things, with a mind freely pervading everywhere without hindrance, with a pure mind entering the realm of omniscience, with a well-ordered mind purified by observing the ornaments of the site of enlightenment, with a broad mind immersed in the ocean of all enlightened teachings, with a vast mind pervading all realms of beings to guide them to perfection, with an immeasurable mind purifying all buddha-lands, with an infinite mind reflected in the circles of all buddhas, abiding indefatigably for all ages, until the ultimate realization of the power, expertise, and unique qualities of all buddhas.

de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang de lta bu'i bsam pa dang / yid la bya ba la brtson par gnas pa'i sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rlan dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dang / sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i skal pa mthun pas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po mthong bar 'gyur bar sngon gyi ltas bcu byung ngo/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po byang chub kyi rgyan rnam par dag pas rnam par dag par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad mi khom pa dang / ngan song dang / ngan 'gro'i lam thams cad rnam par bsal bas rnam par dag par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad pad+mo'i tshal gyi rgyan ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pas rnam par dag par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad sems can thams cad kyi lus dang / sems dga' zhing sim par byed pas rnam par dag par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rin po che thams cad kyi rang bzhin du kun tu gnas pas rnam par dag par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad sems can gyi khams kun mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos rab tu brgyan par kun nas gnas pas rnam par dag par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyan dang lhab lhub kyi sprin gyis kun tu khebs par kun tu gnas pas rnam par dag par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad sems can gyi khams thams cad phan tshun byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems dang / gnod sems med pa'i sems dang ldan par kun nas gnas pas rnam par dag par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snying po byang chub kyi rgyan gyis brgyan par kun nas gnas pas rnam par dag par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad sems can thams cad sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa yid la bya ba la brtson par kun nas gnas pas rnam par dag par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po mthong bar 'gyur ba'i sngon gyi ltas bcu po de dag byung bar gyur to/ /

Furthermore, to Sudhana, engaged in these meditations, there appeared ten signs prefiguring the vision of the enlightening being Universally Good, by virtue of the empowerment of all buddhas having nourished his past roots of goodness, and by virtue of having past roots of goodness equivalent to those of the enlightening being Universally Good. What were those ten signs? All buddha-lands were purified by purification with the adornments of the sites of enlightenment of all buddhas. All buddha-lands were purified by removal of all evils and miserable states and conditions inopportune for enlightenment. All buddha-lands were purified by purification of buddha-lands with arrays of spiritual lotus ponds. All buddha-lands were purified by cooling and refreshing the bodies and minds of all beings. All buddha-lands were purified by becoming made of jewels. All buddha-lands were purified by all the beings becoming adorned with the marks and embellishments of greatness. All buddha-lands were purified by formation of masses of all adornments. All buddha-lands were purified by all the beings becoming kind, benevolent, and friendly to each other. All buddha-lands were purified by becoming arrayed with the adornments of sites of enlightenment. All buddha-lands were purified by all the beings becoming consciously absorbed in mindfulness of Buddha. These ten signs appeared foreshadowing the vision of the great enlightening being Universally Good.

gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthong bar 'gyur ba'i sngon gyi ltas snang ba chen po bcu byung bar gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na; 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba rnams las shin tu phra ba re re zhing yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi dra ba mang po rnam par snang bar gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba rnams las rdul shin tu phra ba re re las kyang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor mang po thon te/ kha dog gcig pa dang / kha dog sna tshogs dang / kha dog brgya stong du mar chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs par gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba rnams las rdul shin tu phra ba re re las kyang rin po che thams cad kyi sprin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs par byed pa mang po thon te chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs par gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba rnams las rdul shin tu phra ba re re las kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba'i 'khor lo dang / dkyil 'khor gyi sprin mang po thon te chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs par gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba rnams las rdul shin tu phra ba re re las kyang spos dang / me tog dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / bdug pa'i sprin mang po thon te byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i yon tan gyi chos rgya mtsho'i sprin thams cad kyi 'brug sgra rab tu sgrog cing / phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs par gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba rnams las rdul shin tu phra ba re re las kyang nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / skar ma'i sprin mang po thon te byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i 'od rab tu 'gyed cing / chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs par gyur to/ / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba rnams las rdul shin tu phra ba re re las kyang lus thams cad kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa'i mar me'i sprin mang po thon nas sangs rgyas kyi 'od zer ltar rab tu snang bar byed cing / chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs par gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba rnams las rdul shin tu phra ba re re las kyang nor bu rin po che'i gzugs de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skur snang ba'i sprin mang po thon nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par 'gengs par gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba rnams las rdul shin tu phra ba re re las kyang 'od zer gyi gzugs de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i dbyibs su snang ba'i sprin mang po thon te sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / smon lam gyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bebs shing / chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs par gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba rnams las rdul shin tu phra ba re re las kyang byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi gzugs brnyan gzugs kyi rnam pa thams cad kyi kha dog tu snang ba'i sprin rgya mtsho sems can thams cad gdon pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi chos kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par sgrub pa mang po thon te chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po mthong bar 'gyur ba'i sngon gyi ltas snang ba chen po bcu po de dag byung bar gyur to/ /

After that, ten great lights appeared, foreshadowing the manifestation of the great enlightening being Universally Good. What were the ten? In each atom of all worlds the network of all buddhas shone. The auras of light of all buddhas emanated from each atom of all worlds, with hundreds of thousands of various colors, and pervaded the whole cosmos. Clouds of jewels manifesting reflections of all buddhas emanated from each atom of all worlds and pervaded the cosmos. Multitudes of circles of flames of all buddhas emanated from each atom of all worlds and pervaded the cosmos. Multitudes of all kinds of fragrant flowers, garlands, perfumes, and incenses emanated from each atom of all worlds and pervaded the cosmos radiating the light of the enlightening being Universally Good. Multitudes of lamps in the forms of all beings emanated from each atom of all worlds and pervaded the cosmos. Multitudes of figures of light beams in the forms of the bodies of all buddhas emanated from each atom of all worlds and pervaded the cosmos showing the basic vows of all buddhas. Oceans of multitudes of reflections of enlightening beings of all forms and appearances, representations of phantom bodies of all beings, fulfilling the wishes of all beings, emanated from each point of all worlds and pervaded the cosmos. These ten great lights appeared foreshadowing the manifestation of Universally Good.

de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis sngon gyi ltas su snang ba bcu po de dag mthong nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po mthong bar 'gyur ba'i skabs ni/ bye/ rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas ni/ brtan/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis ni/ brlabs/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi snang ba ni/ yang dag par skyes/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la ni/ mngon du gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po ni smon lam gyi byin gyis ni/ byin du brlabs/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod yul la ni/ mngon par mos/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul rlabs po che la shin tu nges pa'i stobs dang shugs ni/ rab tu thob/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po mthong na/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob pa dang 'dra bar ni/ sems/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po mthong bar bya ba la dbang po ni/ mngon du gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po mthong bar bya ba la brtson 'grus kyi shugs chen po ni/ thob/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po yongs su btsal ba la brtson 'grus phyir mi ldog pa'i sbyor ba dang ni/ ldan/ phyogs thams cad du mngon du gyur pa'i dbang po'i 'khor lo dang / kun tu lta bas yul yongs su gnod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang / sangs rgyas ma lus pa'i zhabs kyi drung na byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'dug pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i sems de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dmigs par bya ba la yang dag par btang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i dmigs pa yongs su btsal ba dang mi 'bral ba'i bsam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po mthong bar bya ba'i 'du shes kyi rnam pa'i snying po dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi mig byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i lam la zhugs pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa'i bsam pa dang / snying rje chen po'i rdo rje thogs pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i rjes su 'brang bar smon pa; phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / yongs su gnon pa'i rtsal rnam par dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i sa la gnas pa'i ye shes la rnam par spyod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul la yang dag par gnas pa dang ni ldan pa des byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nas mnyam pa nyid rjes su thob pa/ dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song ba/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yul dang ldan pa/ mi 'phrog pa'i spyod yul can/ mu med pa'i ye shes kyi yul dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis rnam par blta ba/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pa/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang na mngon par 'phags pa'i lus dang ldan pa de/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi spyan snga na byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho na ni/ 'dug /byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis ni/ yongs su bskor/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun na/ mdun du byas shing / seng+ge'i khri rin po che'i pad+mo chen po'i snying po can zhig la 'dug pa mthong ste/

Then Sudhana, having seen these ten foreshadowing lights, had the opportunity to see the enlightening being Universally Good, supported by the power of his own roots of goodness, a living manifestation of all buddha-teachings, empowered by all buddhas, immersed in the vows of the enlightening being Universally Good, in the presence of the realm of all buddhas, having the power of certainty of the lofty realm of enlightening beings, perceiving the attainment of the light of omniscience in the sight of the enlightening being Universally Good, his senses directed toward vision of the enlightening being Universally Good, flooded with great energy for the vision of the enlightening being Universally Good, striving unremittingly in the search for the enlightening being Universally Good, with the sphere of his senses turned to all directions, with the body of an enlightening being entering the sphere of the eye of universal good, with a mind directed toward all buddhas and aware of the enlightening being Universally Good in the presence of all buddhas, with a will seeking unremittingly for the enlightening being Universally Good, inwardly perceiving the vision of the enlightening being Universally Good in all objects, with the eye of knowledge on the path of the enlightening being Universally Good, with a mind as vast as space, with a powerful resolve supported by indestructible universal compassion, with a vow to accompany the enlightening being Universally Good throughout all time, with purity of manner equally following the practice of the enlightening being Universally Good, abiding in knowledge based on the state of the enlightening being Universally Good, dwelling in the sphere of all those who realize Thusness, he saw the enlightening being Universally Good sitting on a lion seat in the calyx of a great jewel lotus in front of Vairocana Buddha, the perfectly enlightened one, in an ocean of enlightening beings, his body standing out among the whole assembly, unexcelled by any worldlings, looking over all the enlightening beings, his knowledge endless, his range insuperable, his sphere inconceivable, having arrived at equality of past, present and future and attained equality with all buddhas.

des de'i ba spu'i bu ga thams cad kyi ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'od zer gyi sprin mang po thon nas 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad rab tu snang bar byas nas sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar byed pa mthong ngo/ /des de'i lus las 'od kyi dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sprin mang po kha dog sna tshogs can mang po thon te/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dga' ba dang / mos pa'i shugs rgya chen po rnam par 'phel bar byed pa mthong ngo/ /spyi po dang phrag pa'i lhun gnyis dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas kyang spos 'od 'phro ba'i sprin gyi char kha dog sna tshogs su 'dug pa mang po mngon par thon nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgyas par bkang ste mngon par 'bab pa mthong ngo/ /ba spu'i bu ga thams cad las ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang me tog thams cad kyi sprin gyi char sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mang po mngon par thon nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgyas par bkang ste mngon par 'bab pa mthong ngo/ /ba spu'i bu ga thams cad las ba spu'i sgo re re las kyang spos sna tshogs kyi shing gi sprin mang po sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par thon nas chos kyi dbyings nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas klas pa thams cad rgyas par bkang nas spos kyi shing gi sprin gyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byas te spos dang / phye ma dang / bdug pa'i mdzod zad mi shes pa'i char rab tu 'gyed cing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgyas par bkang ste mngon par 'bab par byed pa mthong ngo/ /ba spu'i sgo thams cad las ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang gos sna tshogs kyi sprin mang po mngon par thon te/ chos kyi dbyings nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas klas pa thams cad kun nas yog par byas nas brgyan par mthong ngo/ /ba spu'i bu ga thams cad las ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang dar sna tshogs kyi lda ldi'i sprin dang / phreng ba sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / mu tig sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi sprin gyi char sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par thon nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgyas par bkang ste mngon par 'bab pa mthong ngo/ /ba spu'i bu ga thams cad las ba spu'i sgo'i re re nas kyang sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bsgrub pa'i phyir rin po che'i shing gi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par thon te chos kyi dbyings nam mkha'i mthas klas pa thams cad rgyas par bkang nas rin po che'i shing las rin po che'i mdzod rnam par 'phro ba'i rgyan gyis brgyan par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dag tu rin po che'i char chen po mngon par 'bab par byed pa mthong ngo/ /ba spu'i bu ga thams cad las ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang gzugs kyi khams kyi lha'i ris kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par thon nas byang chub sems dpa' la yang dag par bsngags pa byed cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa mthong ngo/ /ba spu'i bu ga thams cad las ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang tshangs pa'i rgyud du gtogs pa'i lha'i ris thams cad sprul pa'i sprin mang po mngon par thon te mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol ba 'debs par mthong ngo/ /ba spu'i bu ga thams cad kyi ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang 'dod pa'i khams thams cad du gtogs pa'i lha'i dbang po'i lus kyi sprin mang po mngon par thon te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo mang po yang dag par 'dzin par mthong ngo/ /ba spu'i bu ga thams cad kyi ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang sems kyi skad cig re re la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi sprin dus gsum du gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang 'dra ba/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par thon nas chos kyi dbyings nam mkha'i mthas klas pa thams cad rgyas par bkang ste sems can gnas med pa dang / skyabs med pa dang / rten med pa rnams kyi gnas dang / skyabs dang / rten du gyur pa mthong ngo/ /ba spu'i bu ga thams cad kyi ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang sems kyi skad cig re re las sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa sangs rgyas byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis yongs su gang ba'i sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par thon nas chos kyi dbyings nam mkha'i mthas klas pa thams cad rgyas par bkang ste sems can mos pa rlabs po che rnams yongs su dag par sgrub pa mthong ngo/ /ba spu'i bu ga thams cad las ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang sems kyi skad cig re re la sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa la kun nas nyon mongs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sprin mang po mngon par thon nas chos kyi dbyings nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas klas pa thams cad rgyas par bkang ste kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sems can rnams rnam par dag par sgrub pa mthong ngo/ /ba spu'i bu ga re re'i ba spu'i sgo thams cad las sems kyi skad cig re re la sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun nas nyon mongs pa rnam par dag pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sprin mang po mngon par thon nas chos kyi dbyings nam mkha'i dbyings kyis klas pa thams cad rgyas par bkang ste sems can gcig tu kun nas nyon mongs pa rnams rnam par dag pa sgrub pa mthong ngo/ /ba spu'i bu ga thams cad las ba spu'i sgo re re las kyang sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par thon te sems can gyi khams nam mkha'i dbyings kyis klas pa thams cad rgyas par bkang nas sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i rjes su 'brang bar byed cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo/ /ba spu'i bu ga thams cad las ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang sems kyi skad cig re re la byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi sprin 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par thon nas chos kyi dbyings nam mkha'i dbyings kyis klas pa thams cad rgyas par bkang ste sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan mang po rjod par byed par mthong ngo/ /ba spu'i bu ga thams cad las ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par thon te chos kyi dbyings nam mkha'i dbyings kyis klas pa thams cad rgyas par bkang nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byams klas pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mngon par sgrub pa nye bar sgrub pa mthong ngo/ /ba spu'i bu ga thams cad las ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par thon te sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad mngon par rjod pa mthong ngo/ /ba spu'i bu ga thams cad las ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i don du byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i sprin thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yang dag par 'byung ba/ dga' ba'i shugs rnam par 'phel bar byed pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi char mngon par thon nas mngon par 'bab pa mthong ngo/ /des de'i ba spu'i bu ga thams cad las ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ston pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yang dag par 'byung ba'i chos kyi sprin chen po rnam par 'phel bar byed pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par thon par mthong ngo/ /

He saw clouds of light rays as numerous as atoms in all buddha-lands emanate from each of Universally Good’s pores and illumine all worlds throughout the space of the cosmos, relieving the pain of all beings. He saw as many auras of light as atoms in all buddha-lands emanate from Universally Good’s body, increasing the ecstasy of all enlightening beings. He saw clouds of fragrant flames of various colors emanate from Universally Good’s head and pores, pervading the audiences of all buddhas and showering on them. He saw as many clouds of all kinds of flowers as atoms in all buddha-lands emanate from each of Universally Good’s pores, filling the audiences of all buddhas and showering on them. He saw as many clouds of all kinds of fragrant trees as atoms in all buddha-lands emanate from each of Universally Good’s pores, adorning all universes throughout space with fragrant trees budding with inexhaustible aromatic powders and oils, showering on the audiences of all buddhas. He saw clouds of all kinds of cloth emanate from every pore, covering all universes throughout space and decorating them. He saw clouds of streamers, ornaments, strings of pearls, and wish-fulfilling jewels, numerous as atoms in all buddha-lands, emanate from every pore, filling the assemblies of all buddhas and showering on them to fulfill the wishes of all beings. He saw clouds of jewel trees, as many as atoms in all buddha-lands, emanate from every pore, filling all universes in space, adorning them with blooming jewel trees and showering great rains of jewels on the audiences of all buddhas. He saw multitudes of embodiments of celestial beings, as many as atoms in all buddha-lands, emanate from every pore, filling all worlds praising the enlightening being. He saw multitudes of phantom embodiments of the celestial beings in all the brahma-worlds emanate from every pore, asking the enlightened buddhas to turn the wheel of the teaching. He saw multitudes of embodiments of all the celestials in the realm of desire emanate from every pore, receiving the cycles of teaching of all buddhas. He saw multitudes of all buddha-lands of past, present, and future, as many as atoms in all buddha-lands, emanate from each pore in each mental moment, pervading all universes throughout space as places of rest, salvation, and refuge for beings with no place of rest, no savior, no refuge. He saw multitudes of all buddha-lands, as many as atoms in all buddha-lands, filled with congregations of inspired enlightening beings, emanate from every pore, pervading all universes throughout space, conducive to the purification of beings of lofty resolve. He saw multitudes of pure lands with defilement, as many as atoms in all buddha-lands, emanate from every pore in each moment of thought, pervading all universes throughout space, conducive to the purification of defiled beings. He saw multitudes of defiled lands with mental purity, as many as atoms in all buddha-lands, emanate from every pore in each moment of thought, pervading all universes throughout space, conducive to the purification of wholly defiled beings. He saw multitudes of embodiments of all enlightening beings, as many as atoms in all buddha-lands, emanate from every pore in each instant of consciousness, pervading all universes throughout space, adapting to the conduct of all beings and developing all beings to supreme perfect enlightenment. He saw multitudes of embodiments of enlightening beings, as many as atoms in all buddha-lands, emanate from every pore in each mental moment, pervading all universes throughout space, invoking the names of all buddhas in order to increase the roots of goodness of all beings. He saw multitudes of embodiments of enlightening beings, as many as atoms in all buddha-lands, emanating from every pore, pervading all universes throughout space, in all buddha-lands presenting the accomplishment of all roots of goodness of all enlightening beings, from the first arousal of the aspiration for enlightenment. He saw as many multitudes of enlightening beings as atoms in all buddha-lands emanate from every pore, in each and every buddha-land illustrating the oceans of vows of all enlightening beings for the perfection of the practice of universally Good enlightening beings. He saw as many clouds of practices of the enlightening being Universally Good as atoms in all buddha-lands emanate from every pore, raining showers fulfilling the wishes of all beings, increasing the flood of joy of attainment of omniscience. He also saw as many clouds of perfect enlightenment as atoms in all buddha-lands emanating from every pore, showing perfect enlightenment in all buddha-lands, increasing the great spiritual energy of attainment of omniscience.

de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i rdzu 'phrul gyi yul de lta bu mthong nas dga' rangs te/ mgu zhing nyams bde la tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas de bas kyang shas cher byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i lus la sems sems pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i yan lag re re dang / yan lag rnam par phye ba re re dang / lus kyi cha re re dang / lus kyi cha rnam par phye ba re re dang / yan lag gi phyogs re re dang / yan lag gi phyogs rnam par phye ba re re dang / lus re re dang / lus rnam par phye ba re re dang / ba spu'i bu ga re re dang / ba spu'i bu ga rnam par phye ba re re nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rlung gi phung po dang bcas/ chu'i phung po dang bcas/ sa'i phung po dang bcas/ me'i phung po dang bcas/ rgya mtsho dang bcas/ gling dang bcas/ chu klung dang bcas/ rin po che'i ri dang bcas/ ri rab dang bcas/ khor yug dang bcas/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / ljongs dang / yul dang / khams dang / rgyal po'i gnas dang bcas/ nags tshal dang bcas khang khyim dang bcas/ skye bo'i tshogs dang bcas/ sems can dmyal ba'i 'jig rten dang bcas/ byol song gi skye gnas dang bcas/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang bcas/ lha ma yin gyi 'jig rten dang bcas/ klu'i 'jig rten dang bcas/ nam mkha' lding gi 'jig rten dang bcas/ mi'i 'jig rten dang bcas/ lha'i 'jig rten dang bcas/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten dang bcas/ 'dod pa'i khams kyi yul dang bcas/ gzugs kyi khams kyi yul dang bcas/ gzugs med pa'i khams kyi yul dang bcas/ gzhi dang bcas; rten dang bcas/ dbyibs dang bcas/ sprin dang bcas/ glog dang bcas/ skar ma dang bcas/ nyin zhag dang bcas/ zla ba phyed dang bcas/ zla ba gcig dang bcas/ dus dang bcas/ lo dang bcas/ bskal pa bar ma dang bcas/ bskal pa dang bcas par gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du mthong ngo/ /'jig rten gyi khams 'di la ji lta ba de bzhin du shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyang mthong bar gyur to/ /shar phyogs la ji lta ba de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang sangs rgyas byung ba dang bcas/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas par gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du mthong bar gyur to/ /des mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i sngon gyi mtha'i mur thug pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i mi chen po'i mtshan re re las sangs rgyas byung ba dang bcas/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang bcas/ sems can dang bcas/ khang khyim dang bcas/ nyin zhag dang bcas/ bskal pa dang bcas par mthong bar gyur to/ /de bzhin du phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byams klas pa thams cad kyang mthong bar gyur to/ /ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad mthong bar gyur pa de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i lus dang / mi chen po'i mtshan re re dang / ba spu'i bu ga re re nas shin tu rnam par phye ba dang / phan tshun ma 'dres par mthong bar gyur to/ /

Then Sudhana, having seen this manifestation of Universally Good’s mystic power, happy, fulfilled, enraptured, uplifted, delighted, joyful, contemplated the body of Universally Good further and saw, from every part of his body and every pore, the billionfold world, with its masses of air, earth, and fire, its oceans, continents, rivers, jewel mountains, polar mountains, peripheral mountains, villages, cities, towns, communities, districts, forests, dwellings, populations, hells, animal realms, underworlds, realms of titans, dragons, birds, humans, and celestials, realms of desire, formless realms, its bases, foundations, and forms, its clouds, lightning, stars, nights, days, and fortnights, half years and years, intermediate eons and eons. And as he saw this world, in the same way he saw all the worlds to the east, and as in the east he saw all the worlds in all directions, in the south, west, north, northeast, southeast, southwest, northwest, the nadir and the zenith. By way of reflections he saw the emergence of all buddhas, along with their circles of enlightening beings, as well as other beings, and he saw the succession of all worlds in past eons in this world, all that in one mark of greatness of the body of Universally Good—the emergence of all the buddhas, the circles of enlightening beings, the sentient beings, the abodes, the days and nights, the ages. In the same way he also saw all the buddha-lands of the future. And just as he saw the succession of past and future worlds in this world, in the same way he saw the successions of all past and future worlds in all worlds in the ten directions, through each mark of greatness and each pore on the body of the enlightening being Universally Good, all in perfect order, not mixed up with one another.

byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po yang ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi spyan snga nas seng+ge'i khri rin po che'i pad+mo chen po'i snying po can la 'dug cing rnam par rtse ba 'di lta bu yongs su ston par mthong ba de bzhin du shar phyogs na'ang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po'i dpal gyi 'jig rten gyi khams pad+mo'i dpal na rnam par rtse ba 'di nyid yongs su ston cing 'dug par mthong ngo/ /shar phyogs na ji lta ba de bzhin du phyogs dang phyogs mtshams kun tu 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung na byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po seng+ge'i khri rin po che'i pad+mo chen po'i snying po can la 'dug cing rnam par rtse ba 'di nyid yongs su ston pa mthong ngo/ /ji ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung na seng+ge'i khri rin po che'i pad+mo chen po'i snying po can la 'dug cing rnam par rtse ba 'di nyid yongs su ston par mthong ba de bzhin du phyogs bcu kun gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba dag la rdul shin tu phra ba re re'i sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chos kyi dbyings ltar rgya che ba dag na byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung na seng+ge'i khri rin po che'i pad+mo chen po'i snying po can la 'dug cing rnam par rtse ba 'di nyid yongs su ston pa mthong ngo/ /de'i lus re re las kyang dus gsum du byung ba'i dmigs pa thams cad gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du rnam par dmigs par mngon par bstan pa mthong ngo/ /zhing thams cad dang / sems can thams cad dang / sangs rgyas byung ba thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du rnam par dmigs par mngon du bstan pa mthong ngo/ /sems can thams cad kyi sgra dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dbyangs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dang / gdams ngag yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag par bsdu ba thams cad dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par rol pa dag kyang thos par gyur to/ /

And just as he saw the enlightening being Universally Good sitting on a jewel lotus calyx lion seat before Vairocana Buddha displaying this miracle, likewise he saw him displaying the same miracle in the world Padmashri of Bhadrashri Buddha in the east; and as in the east, he also saw the enlightening being Universally Good sitting on a jewel lotus calyx lion seat in the presence of all buddhas in all worlds everywhere displaying this same miracle, and from each individual body of Universally Good he saw all objects of past, present, and future appearing in reflections, and likewise saw all lands, all beings, all buddhas emerging, and all congregations of enlightening beings appearing as reflections; and he heard the voices of all beings, the voices of all buddhas, the turning of the wheel of teaching of all buddhas, the presentation of all advice and instruction, the attainments of all enlightening beings, and the mystic powers of all buddhas.

des de ltar byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i rnam par rtse ba de lta bu dag mthong ste/ thos nas ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnams pa bcu thob par gyur to/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems kyi skad cig gcig la sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad lus kyis rgyas par dgang ba'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa thob par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung du 'gro ba la tha mi dad pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa thob par gyur to; ;de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa thob par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las de bzhin gshegs pa re re las kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su zhus pa rab tu blang pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa thob par gyur to; ;de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo nges par rtogs par bya ba'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa thob par gyur to/ /sangs brgya kyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa thob par gyur to/ /tha dad pa yang dag par ye shes zad mi shes pas phyi ma'i mur thug pa'i bskal par byin gyis brlabs te chos kyi tshig gcig shin tu bstan pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa thob par gyur to/ /chos rgya mtsho thams cad mngon sum du rab tu shes pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa thob par gyur to/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad kyi ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa thob par gyur to/ /sems can thams cad kyi 'du shes kyi rnam pa yongs su sgrub pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa thob par gyur to/ /skad cig gcig la byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa mngon sum du rab tu shes pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa thob par gyur te/

Having seen and heard this inconceivable miracle of the enlightening being Universally Good, he attained ten states of consummation of knowledge. What were these ten? He attained the state of consummation of knowledge physically pervading all buddha-lands in a moment of thought. He attained the state of consummation of holistic knowledge going to the presence of all buddhas. He attained the state of consummation of knowledge serving all buddhas. He attained the state of consummation of knowledge asking about the Teaching and receiving answers from each and every buddha. He attained the state of consummation of knowledge of meditation on the cycles of teaching of all buddhas. He attained the state of consummation of knowledge of the inconceivable miracles of buddhas.
He attained the state of consummation of knowledge to expound one expression of truth forever by means of inexhaustible specific knowledge of all truths.
He attained the state of consummation of direct knowledge of the ocean of all truths. He attained the state of consummation of knowledge of all principles of the realm of reality. He attained the state of consummation of knowledge to live together with the thoughts of all beings. He attained the state of consummation of knowledge of instantaneous direct witness of the practice of the enlightening being Universally Good.

de ltar ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa dang ldan pa'i tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gi spyi bor byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste bzhag par gyur to/ /de ltar tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gi spyi bo la byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos lag pa bzhag ma thag tu de'i mod la des ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la zhugs par gyur te/ ting nge 'dzin re res kyang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed sngon chad ma mthong ba dag la'ang zhugs par gyur to/ /de'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyang tshogs su gyur to/ /de'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos kyi tshogs sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba byung bar gyur to/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rab tu gnas par bya ba chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis mngon par 'phags par gyur to/ / smon lam rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la'ang zhugs par gyur to/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ba'i lam sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kyang rab tu byung bar gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la'ang rab tu zhugs par gyur to; ;thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shugs drag po sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kyang rnam par 'phel ba 'gyur to/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes snang ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kyang rab tu snang bar gyur to/ /

To Sudhana, who had realized these states of consummate knowledge, Universally Good extended his right hand and laid it on his head. With Universally Good’s hand on Sudhana’s head, as many concentrations as atoms in all buddha-lands entered into Sudhana, and by each concentration he entered into as many oceans of worlds as atoms in all buddha-lands; as many hitherto unseen provisions for omniscience as atoms in all buddha-lands accrued to him; as many origins of elements of omniscience as atoms in all buddha-lands became manifest to him; he rose up for as many great undertakings for omniscience as atoms in all buddha-lands; he entered into as many oceans of vows as atoms in all buddha-lands; he went forth on as many emancipating paths of omniscience as atoms in all buddha-lands; he was involved in as many practices of enlightening beings as atoms in all buddha-lands; he was boosted by as many floods of omniscience as atoms in all buddha-lands; he was illumined by as many lights of knowledge of all buddhas as atoms in all buddha-lands.

ji ltar mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi spyan sngar 'dug pas lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gi spyi bor bzhag pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung na 'dug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos kyang lag pa g.yas pa brkyang zhing / tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gi spyi bo la bzhag par gyur to/ /de bzhin du phyogs dang / phyogs mtshams thams cad kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba'i khongs su chud pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung na 'dug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos kyang lag pa g.yas pa brkyang zhing tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gi spyi bo la bzhag par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhabs kyi drung na 'dug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i lag pas reg ste tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis chos kyi sgo mang po la zhugs par gyur pa de bzhin du kun tu bzang po'i lus thams cad las 'phos pa'i lag pa'i sprin mang pos reg pas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis kyang chos kyi sgo mang po la tshul sna tshogs kyis zhugs par gyur to/ /

Just as in this world, in the presence of Vairocana Buddha, the enlightening being Universally Good extended his right hand and laid it on Sudhana’s head, in the same way Universally Good sitting at the feet of all buddhas in all worlds extended his right hand and laid it on Sudhana’s head. In the same way, sitting at the feet of all buddhas in all worlds within the atoms of all worlds Universally Good extended his right hand and laid it on Sudhana’s head. And just as facets of truth entered Sudhana as he was touched by the hand of Universally Good at the feet of Vairocana Buddha, likewise facets of truth entered Sudhana in various ways as he was touched by the multitudes of hands extended from the bodies of all the Universally Goods.
de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis nga'i rnam par 'phrul pa mthong mod/ /
Then the great enlightening being Universally Goodsaid to Sudhana, “Did you see my mystical projection?”
smras pa/ 'phags pa/ mthong ni mthong na/ de tsam du bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam par thar pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen na mkhyen grang ngo/ /
Sudhana said, “I saw, noble one. But only a buddha could understand such an inconceivable mystical projection.”

des smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ ngas ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems mngon par 'dod cing / bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig tu rnam par spyad de/ bskal pa chen po de dag re re la yang byang chub kyi sems yongs su sbyong bar byed cing / ngas de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig bsnyen bkur to/ /bskal pa chen po de dag re re la yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bsod nams yongs su sdud par byed cing / mchod sbyin chen po gtong ba thams cad dang sbyar ba/ 'jig rten thams cad du rnam par grags pa/ sems can thams cad la bstabs pa dag kyang mchod sbyin du byas so/ /bskal pa chen po de dag re re la yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos la mngon par smon cing gtong ba dang / gtong ba chen po dang / shin tu gtong ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig byas so/ /bskal pa chen po de dag re re la yang lus dang / srog phangs par bya ba med par sangs rgyas kyi chos gces par bya bas lus brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa zhig yongs su btang ngo/ /rgyal po'i srid chen po yang yongs su btang ngo/ /grong dang / grong khyer dang / ljongs dang / yul dang / khams dang / rgyal po'i gnas dag kyang yongs su btang ngo/ /sdug cing yid du 'ong la btang mi bra ba'i 'khor gyi tshogs dag kyang yongs su btang ngo/ /bu dang / bu mo dang / chung ma de dag kyang yongs su btang ngo/ /rang gi lus dang sha dag kyang yongs su btang ngo/ /bdag gi lus las khrag dag kyang slong ba rnams la yongs su btang ngo/ /rus pa dang / rkang dag kyang yongs su btang ngo/ /yang lag dang nying lag dag kyang yongs su btang ngo/ /sna dang rna ba dag kyang yongs su btang ngo/ /mig dag kyang yongs su btang ngo/ /rang gi kha nas lce'i dbang po dag kyang yongs su btang ngo/ /bskal pa de dag re re la yang 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing bla na med par 'gyur pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dbu la mngon par smon cing / rang gi mgo sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig yongs su btang ngo/ /bskal pa chen po re re la ji lta ba de bzhin du bskal pa chen po rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed las bskal pa rgya mtsho re re la yang de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig la dbang po dam par gyur te rim gro byas so/ /bkur sti byas so/ /phu dud du byas so/ / mchod pa byas so/ /na bza' dang / bshos dang / gzims cha dang / snyun gyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad dag kyang dbul ba byas so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi bstan pa la yang rab tu byung ste sangs rgyas kyi gdams ngag thams cad la yang rab tu zhugs so/ /de dag gi bstan pa yang yongs su bzung ngo/ /

Universally Goodsaid, “I practiced for as many eons as atoms in untold buddha-lands, seeking the mind of omniscience, and in each immense eon I associated with as many buddhas as atoms in untold buddha-lands, to purify the aspiration for enlightenment. And in each immense eon I made great sacrifices, giving away everything, announced in all worlds, fulfilling all beings, storing virtue for omniscience. And in each immense eon I made as many great sacrifices as atoms in untold buddha-lands, extreme sacrifices, seeking the qualities of omniscience. And in each immense eon I gave up my body untold numbers of times, and I gave up kingships, villages, cities, towns, counties, and communities, and I gave up dearly beloved companions, so hard to give up, and I gave up spouses and children. I gave away the flesh of my own body and gave blood from my own body to beggars, and I gave away my bones and marrow. I gave away my limbs, my ears and nose, my eyes and tongue, caring only for buddha-knowledge and not for my physical life. In each immense eon I gave away as many of my own bodies as atoms in untold buddha-lands, seeking from my own bodies the unsurpassed head of omniscience which rises beyond all worlds. And as I did in each immense eon, so also did I do in oceans of great eons as numerous as atoms in untold buddha-lands. In each immense eon I honored and served as many buddhas as atoms in untold buddha-lands, providing food and clothing, shelter, furniture, medicine, and other necessities. And I went forth into the tutelage of each buddha, applied the instructions of all buddhas, and I hold their Teaching.

rigs kyi bu/ de snyed kyi bskal pa rgya mtshor yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la sems bskyed pa 'ga' tsam gyis kyang mi mthun pa'i sems bskyed du mi dran no/ /de snyed kyi bskal pa rgya mtshor sems bskyed pa 'ga' tsam gyis kyang khong khro ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'am/ bdag tu 'dzin pa'i sems sam/ bdag yongs su bskyang zhing yongs su gzung ba'i sems sam/ bdag dang gzhan du dbye ba'i sems sam; byang chub kyi lam dang 'bral bar bya ba'i sems sam/ 'khor ba na gnas pas yongs su skyo ba'i sems sam/ zhum pa'i sems sam/ sgrib pas mgo rmongs pa'i sems bskyed du mi dran te/ gzhan du na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs gsag pa'i phyir byang chub kyi sems ye shes gzhan gyis mi thub cing brgal bar dka' ba'i snying po dang ldan pa bskyed do/ /

“I do not know of a single thought in all those oceans of eons in which I neglected the instructions of the buddhas. I am not aware of having had a single malicious thought in all those eons, or an egotistic thought, or a selfish thought of possession, or a thought of difference between self and others, or a thought of parting from the path of enlightening beings, or a thought of weariness at staying in the world, or a thought of depression, or a thought deluded by hindrances, or any thought apart from the aspiration for enlightenment, the invulnerable asylum of invincible knowledge, directed toward preparations for omniscience.

rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ nga'i sngon gyi sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas pa'i sbyor ba dag dang / des snying rje chen po'i sems rab tu thob ste/ sems can yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su smin par bya ba dang / yongs su sbyang bar byas pa'i sbyor ba dag dang / sangs rgyas mchod cing bsnyen bkur ba'i sbyor ba dag dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su btsal ba'i don du bla ma la rim gro byas pa'i sbyor ba dag dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i don du lus yongs su btang ba'i sbyor ba dag dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su bsrung ba'i don du rang gi srog yongs su btang ba'i sbyor ba de dag ni/ bstan par bya na bskal pa rgya mtsho thams cad zad par 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu/ ngas ni/ chos rgya mtsho de snyed cig las kyang tshig dang / yi ge 'ga' tsam yang sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa la brtson pa dang / rang gi sems kyi rgyud nges par shes par bya ba la brtson pa dang / pha rol gyi chos mngon du thos par bya ba la brtson pa dang / 'jig rten pa'i ye shes snang ba thams cad rab tu brjod pa la brtson pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes thams cad rab tu brjod pa la brtson pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'khor ba'i bde ba yongs su bskyed pa la brtson pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan yang dag par bsngags pa la brtson pas 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid yongs su btang bas ma nyos pa'am/ bdog pa thams cad yongs su btang bas ma nyos pa gang med de/ de ltar nga nyid kyi sngon gyi sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa bstan par bya na/ bskal pa rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed zad par 'gyur ro/ /

“All oceans of eons would be exhausted in telling of my past efforts to purify buddha-lands, my compassionate efforts to save, develop, and purify all beings, my efforts to serve buddhas, my efforts in listening to teachers in quest of truth, my self-sacrifice for the sake of absorbing truth, my sacrifice of life to protect truth. Of all the oceans of teachings, there is not a single statement that I did not get by giving up rulership, that I did not get by giving up all that exists, by undertaking the salvation of all beings, by contemplating my own being, by undertaking to attain higher states ahead, by undertaking to produce the light of all worldly knowledge, by undertaking to produce the light of all transmundane knowledge, by undertaking to produce mundane happiness for all sentient beings, by undertaking to tell of the virtues of all buddhas. Thus it would take up as many eons as atoms in untold buddha-lands to tell of the accomplishment of my past endeavors.

rigs kyi bu/ de ltar ngas rnam pa de lta bu'i tshogs kyi stobs dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyu bsags pa'i stobs dang / mos pa rgya chen po'i stobs dang / yon tan la nan tan du bya ba'i stobs dang / chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud par bya ba'i stobs dang / shes rab kyi mig gi stobs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs dang / smon lam chen po'i stobs dang / snying rje chen po'i stobs dang / shin tu sbyangs pa'i mngon par shes pa'i stobs dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba'i stobs kyis chos kyi lus yongs su dag pa dus gsum du tha mi dad pa thob par gyur to/ /bla na med pa'i gzugs kyi lus 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsam la ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmigs pa/ thams cad du rjes su song ba/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rab tu gzhol ba/ thams cad du rab tu gnas pa/ rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad rnam pa thams cad du ston pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi yid du 'ong ba yang yongs su sbyangs so/ /

“By such power of preparation, power of accomplishment of assemblage of root causes, power of lofty resolution, power of accomplishment of virtues, power of contemplation of all truths as they are, power of the eye of wisdom, power bestowed by buddha, power of great vows, power of great compassion, power of thoroughly purified mystic knowledge, power of the care of spiritual benefactors, I attained the ultimately pure body of reality, which is continuous and unfragmented throughout past, present, and future. I also purified an unexcelled physical body, beyond all worldlings, appearing to all beings according to their mentalities, omnipresent, in all buddha-lands, abiding everywhere, showing all kinds of mystical projections everywhere, visible in all worlds.

rigs kyi bu/ ngas lus thob pa phun sum tshogs pa/ bskal pa rgya mtsho mtha' yas pas yongs su grub pa/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang pos 'byung bar dka' ba 'di la ltos/ rigs kyi bu/ nga ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa'i sems can rnams kyi rna lam du yang mi 'ong na/ mthong bar lta ci zhig smos; rigs kyi bu/ sems can gang dag nga'i ming thos pa tsam gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba yod do/ /mthong ba tsam dang / skyal ba tsam dang / reg pa tsam dang / rjes su 'brang ba tsam dang / rmi lam du mthong ba tsam dang / rmi lam du ming thos pa tsam gyis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba yod de/

“Look at this body I have achieved, produced over endless multitudes of eons, hard to get to appear even in decillions of eons, hard to get to see. Beings who have not planted roots of goodness cannot even hear of me, much less see me. There are beings who become irreversible on the way to supreme perfect enlightenment just by hearing my name; there are those who become irreversible just by seeing me, those who become irreversible just by contact with me, those who become irreversible just by following me, those who become irreversible just by associating with me, those who become irreversible by seeing me in a dream, and those who become irreversible on the way to supreme perfect enlightenment by hearing my name in a dream.

sems can la las ni nga nyin zhag gcig tu dran par byas na/ yongs su smin par 'gyur ro/ /la las ni zhag bdun dang / la las ni zla ba phyed dang / la las ni zla ba gcig dang / la las ni lo gcig dang / la las ni lo brgya dang / la las ni bskal pa gcig dang / la las ni bskal pa brgya nas/ la las ni bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du nga rjes su dran par byas na/ yongs su smin par 'gyur ro/ /la las ni tshe gcig tu nga rjes su dran par byas na/ yongs su smin par 'gyur ro/ la las ni tshe'i rgyud sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad kyis yongs su smin par 'gyur ro/ /sems can la las ni nga'i 'od mthong bas yongs su smin par 'gyur ro/ /la las ni 'od zer bkye ba mthong bas/ la la ni zhing bskyod pas/ la la ni gzugs kyi lus bstan pas/ la la ni dga' bar byas pas yongs su smin par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu/ de ltar thabs kyi tshul sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ sems can gang gis nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa thos pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye'o/ /gang gis nga'i lus yongs su dag pa mthong bar gyur pa de dag ni nga'i lus lta bur skye bar 'gyur gyi/ rigs kyi bu/ nga'i lus rnam par dag pa 'di la ltos shig /

“Some beings become mature by remembering me for a day and a night; some become mature remembering me for a fortnight, some a month, some a year, some a century, some an eon, some a hundred eons, and some up to as many eons as atoms in untold buddha-lands. Some become mature remembering me for one lifetime, some a hundred lifetimes, some up to as many lifetimes as atoms in untold buddha-lands. Some become mature by seeing my radiance, some by seeing emanation of light beams, some by feeling the earth quake, some by seeing my physical form, some by being encouraged. Thus beings become irreversible toward supreme perfect enlightenment through as many means as atoms in a buddha-land. Furthermore, whoever hears of the purity of my buddha-land shall be born in pure buddha-lands, and whoever sees the purity of my body will be born in my body. Behold the purity of this body of mine.

de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i lus la bsam pa dang / ba spu'i bu ga re re la yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa sangs rgyas skye bas yongs su gang bar mthong ngo/ /zhing rgya mtsho re re na yang de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rgya mtsho kun nas bskor ba mang po bzhugs par mthong ngo/ /zhing rgya mtsho de dag thams cad kyang gzhi sna tshogs dang / dbyibs sna tshogs dang / rgyan sna tshogs dang / khor yug sna tshogs dang / sprin sna tshogs dang / nam mkha' sna tshogs kyis kun nas khebs pa dang / sangs rgyas 'byung ba sna tshogs dang / chos kyi 'khor lo sna tshogs kyi dbyangs dang ldan par mthong ngo/ /ba spu'i bu ga re re la ji lta ba bzhin du ba spu'i bu ga ma lus pa thams cad dang / mtshan thams cad dang / dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / yan lag dang nying lag thams cad la yang de bzhin te/ zhing rgya mtsho re re nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi sku sprul pa'i sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas phyogs bcur 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par bkang ste bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa mthong ngo/ /

Then Sudhana, contemplating the body of the enlightening being Universally Good, saw in each and every pore untold multitudes of buddha-lands filled with buddhas. And in each buddha-land he saw the buddhas surrounded by assemblies of enlightening beings. And he saw that all those multitudes of lands had various bases, various forms, various arrays, various perimeters, various clouds covering the skies, various buddhas appearing, various enunciations of cycles of the Teaching. And just as he saw this in each pore, so also in all pores at once, in all the marks of greatness, all the embellishments, all the limbs and parts of the body; and in each he saw multitudes of lands, with as many multitudes of projected bodies of buddhas, as atoms in all buddha-lands, emerging and filling all worlds in the ten directions developing beings toward supreme perfect enlightenment.

de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i gdams ngag dang / rjes su bstan pas rjes su bstan nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i lus kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du zhugs te sems can yongs su smin par byed par gyur to; ;de ltar tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig gi drung du phyin te mthong ba dang / bsnyen bkur bas ye shes kyi snang ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po mthong ste dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags par gyur pa de'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /stong gi char yang ma yin/ brgya stong gi char yang ma yin/ bye ba brgya stong gi char yang ma yin/ grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dper dang / rgyur bya ba tsam du yang mi phod do/ /des dang po sems bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po mthong ba'i bar der sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa ji snyed cig la zhugs par gyur pa de dag pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi bar du byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i ba spu'i bu ga re rer sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa mang po la sems kyi skad cig gcig gis zhugs par gyur te/ ba spu'i bu ga re rer ji lta ba bzhin du ba spu'i bu ga ma lus pa thams cad la yang sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rnam par gnon pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal par byin gyis brlabs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par 'gengs pas zhugs kyang zhing rgya mtsho gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i mthar phyin par ma gyur te/ zhing rgya mtsho'i lhun dang / zhing rgya mtsho'i bye brag dang / zhing rgya mtsho yongs su bsdu ba dang / zhing rgya mtsho yongs su 'grub pa dang / zhing rgya mtsho 'jig pa dang / zhing rgya mtsho rnam par phye ba dang / sangs rgyas byung ba rgya mtsho gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang / sangs rgyas byung ba rgya mtsho'i sku dang / sangs rgyas byung ba rgya mtsho yongs su bsdu ba dang / sangs rgyas byung ba rgya mtsho yongs su 'byung ba dang / sangs rgyas byung ba rgya mtsho 'jig pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho'i lus dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho'i bye brag dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho yongs su bsdu ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho yongs su 'byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho 'jig pa dang / sems can gyi khams la 'jug pa dang / sems kyi skad cig re res sems can gyi dbang po shes pa la 'jug pa dang / sems can gyi dbang po shes pa khong du chud par bya ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya zhing gdul ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa zab mo la rnam par gnas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su gnon pa rgya mtsho'i mthar yang phyin par ma gyur te/

Then Sudhana, edified by the advice and instruction of the enlightening being Universally Good, entered into all the worlds within the body of Universally Good and developed the beings toward maturity. Furthermore, the light of knowledge and roots of goodness accumulated by Sudhana in going to, meeting, and attending as many spiritual benefactors as atoms in a buddha-land did not amount to even a minute fraction, not to any calculable fraction, of his accumulation of roots of goodness concomitant with seeing Universally Good. As many successive buddha-lands as he had entered from his first determination up to his seeing Universally Good, he entered more, successive oceans of buddha-lands, with attributes as numerous as atoms in untold buddha-lands, in a single pore of Universally Good in each moment of thought. And as in one pore, so in all pores; in each moment of thought passing as many worlds as atoms in untold buddha-lands, passing the worlds of endless eons at a step, he still did not come to the end—he did not come to the end of the successions of oceans of lands, of the matrices of oceans of lands, of the differentiations of oceans of lands, of the interpenetrations of oceans of lands, of the origins of untold oceans of buddha-lands, of the dissolutions of oceans of lands, of the arrays of oceans of lands, of the matrices of oceans of appearances of buddhas, of the interpenetrations of oceans of appearances of buddhas, of the origins of oceans of appearances of buddhas, of the dissolutions of oceans of appearances of buddhas, of the oceans of congregations of enlightening beings, of the successions of oceans of congregations of enlightening beings, the matrices of oceans of congregations of enlightening beings, the differentiations of oceans of congregations of enlightening beings, the unity of oceans of congregations of enlightening beings, the formations of oceans of congregations of enlightening beings, the dissolutions of oceans of congregations of enlightening beings, the entrances of realms of sentient beings, the entrances of instantaneous knowledge of faculties of sentient beings, the penetrations of knowledge of sentient beings’ faculties, the developmental guidance of sentient beings, the profound states of occult powers of enlightening beings, or the multitudes of enlightening beings’ accessions to and supercessions of the stages.

de zhing la lar ni/ bskal par rnam par spyad par gyur to/ /zhing la lar ni/ bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar du spyad par gyur te/ zhing de dag nas kyang g.yos pa med do/ /sems kyi skad cig re re la yang zhing rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa la 'jug cing / sems can rnams kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byed par gyur te/ des de ltar mthar gyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang / smon lam rgya mtsho mnyam pa nyid kyi bar du'ang mthong bar gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid dang / zhing thams cad lus kyis rgyas par dgang ba mnyam pa nyid dang / spyod pa yongs su rdzogs pas rgyas par dgang ba mnyam pa nyid dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su bstan pas rgyas par dgang ba mnyam pa nyid dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mnyam pa nyid dang / tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang / dbyangs brjod pa mnyam pa nyid dang / dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtsho thams cad kyi spyor ba mnyam pa nyid dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa mnyam pa nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pa mnyam pa nyid dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po mnyam pa nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa mnyam pa nyid kyang rjes su thob par gyur to/ /

He traveled and contemplated in a land for an eon, in another for up to as many as eons as atoms in untold buddha-lands, without moving from that land. In each moment of consciousness he entered infinite oceans of lands and developed sentient beings toward supreme perfect enlightenment. This continued as he gradually attained equality with Universally Good in terms of the ocean of vows of practice of the universally Good enlightening beings, equality with all buddhas, equality of pervasion of all lands, equality of fulfillment of practices, equality of manifestation of the miracle of attainment of enlightenment, equality of turning the wheel of teaching, equality of purity of intellect, equality of voice and articulation, equality of power and expertise, equality of the enlightened state, equality of universal love and compassion, equality of the spiritual metamorphoses of the inconceivable liberation of enlightening beings.

de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos bskal pa dang / bskal pa 'byams klas pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag brnan te mngon par brjod pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis smon lam btab pa/
Then the great enlightening being Universally Good, thus explaining courses of eons, as many eons as atoms in the untold buddha-lands in the succession of worlds, went on to make a vow:

ji snyed su dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/ / dus gsum gshegs pa mi yi seng+ge kun/ / bdag gis ma lus de dag thams cad la/ / lus dang ngag yid dang bas phyag bgyi'o/ /
bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam stobs dag gis/ / rgyal ba thams cad yid kyis mngon sum du; ; zhing gi rdul snyed lus rab btud pa yis/ / rgyal ba kun la rab tu phyag 'tshal lo/ /
rdul gcig steng na rdul snyed sangs rgyas rnams/ / sangs rgyas sras kyi dbus na bzhugs pa dag / de ltar chos kyi dbyings rnams ma lus par/ / thams cad rgyal ba bdag gis gang bar mos/ /
de dag bsngags pa mi zad rgya mtsho rnams/ / dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtsho'i sgra kun gyis/ / rgyal ba kun gyi yon tan rab brjod cing / / bde bar gshegs pa thams cad bdag gis bstod/ /
me tog dam pa phreng ba dam pa dang / / sil snyan rnams dang byug pa bdug mchog dang / / mar me'i mchog dang bdug spos dam pa yis/ / rgyal ba de dag la ni mchod par bgyi/ /
na bza' dam pa rnams dang dri mchog dang / / phye ma'i phur ma ri rab mnyam pa dang / / khyad par can gyi rgyan mchog thams cad kyis/ / rgyal ba de dag la ni mchod par bgyi/ /
mchod pa gang rnams bla med rgya che ba/ / de dag rgyal ba thams cad la yang mos/ / bzang po spyod la dad pa'i stobs dag gis/ / rgyal ba kun la phyag 'tshal mchod par bgyi/ /
'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dbang gis na/ / lus dang ngag dang de bzhin yid kyis kyang / / sdig pa bdag gis bgyis pa ci mchis pa/ / de dag thams cad bdag gis so sor bshags/ /
phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba kun dang sangs rgyas sras/ / rang rgyal rnams dang slob dang mi slob dang / / 'gro ba rnams kyi bsod nams gang la yang / / de dag kun gyi rjes su bdag yi rang / /
gang rnams phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten sgron ma dag / byang chub rim par sangs rgyas ma chags brnyes; ; mgon po de dag bdag gis thams cad la/ / 'khor lo bla na med pa bskor bar bskul/ /
mya ngan 'da' ston gang bzhed de dag la/ / 'gro ba kun la phan zhing bde ba'i phyir/ / bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed bzhugs par yang / / bdag gis thal mo rab sbyar gsol bar bgyi/ /
phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod cing bshags pa dang / / rjes su yi rang bskul zhing gsol ba yi/ / dge ba cung zad bdag gis ci bsags pa/ / thams cad bdag gi byang chub phyir bsngo 'o/ /
'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang phyogs bcu yi/ / 'jig rten dag na gang bzhugs mchod par gyur/ / gang yang ma byon de dag rab myur bar/ / bsam rdzogs byang chub rim par sangs rgyas spyon/ /
phyogs bcu ga la'i zhing rnams ji snyed pa/ / de dag rgya cher yongs su dag par gyur/ / byang chub shing dbang drung gshegs rgyal ba dang / / sangs rgyas sras kyis rab tu gang bar shog /
phyogs bcu'i sems can gang rnams ji snyed pa/ / de dag rtag tu nad med bde bar gyur/ / 'gro ba kun gyi chos kyi don rnams ni/ / mthun par gyur cing re ba'ang 'grub par shog /
byang chub spyod pa dag ni bdag spyod cing / / 'gro ba kun tu skye ba dran par gyur/ / tshe rabs kun tu 'chi 'pho skye ba na/ / rtag tu bdag ni rab tu 'byung bar shog /
rgyal ba kun gyi rjes su slob gyur te/ / bzang po spyod pa yongs su rdzogs byed cing / / tshul khrims spyod pa dri med yongs dag par/ / rtag tu ma nyams skyon med spyod par shog /
lha yi skad dang klu dang gnod sbyin skad/ / grul bum dag dang mi yi skad rnams dang / / 'gro ba kun gyi sgra rnams ji tsam par/ / thams cad skad du bdag gis chos bstan to/ /
des shing pha rol phyin la rab brtson te/ / byang chub sems ni nam yang brjed ma gyur/ / sdig pa gang rnams sgrib par 'gyur ba dag / de dag ma lus yongs su byang bar shog /
las dang nyon mongs bdud kyi las rnams las/ / grol zhing 'jig rten 'gro ba rnams su yang / / ji ltar pad+mo rgyus mi chags pa bzhin/ / nyi zla nam mkhar thogs pa med ltar spyad/ /
zhing gi khyon dang phyogs rnams ji tsam par/ / ngan song sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar byed; ; bde ba dag la 'gro ba kun 'god cing / / 'gro ba thams cad la ni phan par spyad/ /
byang chub spyod pa yongs su rdzogs byed cing / / sems can dag gi spyod dang mthun par 'jug / bzang po spyod pa dag ni rab ston cing / / ma 'ongs bskal pa kun tu spyod par gyur/ /
bdag gi spyod dang mtshungs par gang spyod pa/ / de dag dang ni rtag tu 'grogs par shog / lus dang ngag rnams dang ni sems kyis kyang / / spyod pa dag dang smon lam gcig tu spyad/ /
bdag la phan par 'dod pa'i grogs po dag / bzang po spyod pa rab tu ston pa rnams/ / de dag dang yang rtag tu phrad par shog / de dag bdag gis nam yang yid mi dbyung / /
sangs rgyas sras kyis bskor ba'i mgon po rnams; ; mngon sum rtag tu bdag gis rgyal ba blta/ / ma 'ongs bskal pa kun tu mi skyo bar/ / de dag la yang mchod pa rgya cher bgyi/ /
rgyal ba rnams kyi dam pa'i chos 'dzin cing / / byang chub spyod pa kun tu snang bar byed/ / bzang po spyod pa rnam par spyod pa yang / / ma 'ongs bskal pa kun tu spyad par bgyi/ /
srid pa thams cad du yang 'khor ba na/ / bsod nams ye shes dag ni mi zad rnyed/ / thabs dang shes rab ting 'dzin rnam thar dang / / yon tan kun gyi mi zad mdzod du gyur/ /
rdul gcig steng na rdul snyed zhing rnams te/ / zhing der bsam gyis mi khyab sangs rgyas rnams/ / sangs rgyas sras kyi dbus na bzhugs pa la/ / byang chub spyad pa spyod cing blta bar bgyi/ /
de ltar ma lus thams cad phyogs su yang / / skra tsam khyon la dus gsum tshad snyed kyi/ / sangs rgyas rgya mtsho zhing rnams rgya mtsho dang / / bskal pa rgya mtshor spyod cing rab tu 'jug /
gsung gcig yan lag rgya mtsho'i sgra skad kyi/ / rgyal ba kun dbyangs yan lag rnam dag pa/ / 'gro ba kun gyi bsam pa ji bzhin dbyangs/ / sangs rgyas gsung la rtag tu 'jug par bgyi/ /
dus gsum gshegs pa'i rgyal ba thams cad dag / 'khor lo tshul rnams rab tu bskor ba yi/ / de dag gi yang gsung dbyangs mi zad la/ / blo yi stobs kyis bdag kyang rab tu 'jug /
ma 'ongs bskal pa thams cad 'jug par yang / / skad cig gcig gis bdag kyang 'jug par bgyi/ / gang yang bskal pa dus gsum tshad de dag / skad cig cha shas kyis ni zhugs par spyad/ /
dus gsum gshegs pa mi yi seng+ge dag / de dag skad cig gcig la bdag gis blta/ / rtag tu de dag gi ni spyod yul la/ / sgyu mar gyur pa'i rnam thar stobs kyis 'jug /
gang yang dus gsum dag gi zhing bkod pa/ / de dag rdul gcig steng du mngon par sgrub/ / de ltar ma lus phyogs rnams thams cad du/ / rgyal ba rnams kyi zhing gi rgyan la 'jug /
gang yang ma byon 'jig rten sgron ma rnams/ / de dag rim par 'tshang rgya 'khor lo bskor/ / mya ngan 'das pa rab tu zhi mtha' ston/ / mgon po kun gyi drung du bdag mchi'o/ /
kun tu myur ba'i rdzu 'phrul stobs rnams dang / / kun nas sgo yi theg pa'i stobs dag dang / / kun tu yon tan spyod pa'i stobs rnams dang / / kun tu khyab pa byams pa dag gi stobs/ /
kun tu dge ba'i bsod nams stobs rnams dang / / chags pa med par gyur pa'i ye shes stobs/ / shes rab thabs dang ting 'dzin stobs dag gis/ / byang chub stobs rnams yang dag sgrub par byed/ /
las kyi stobs rnams yongs su dag byed cing / / nyon mongs stobs rnams kun tu 'joms par byed/ / bdud kyi stobs rnams stobs med rab byed cing / / bzang po spyod pa'i stobs ni rdzogs par bgyi/ /
zhing rnams rgya mtsho rnam par dag byed cing / / sems can rgya mtsho dag ni rnam par sgrol/ / chos rnams rgya mtsho rab tu mthong byed cing / / ye shes rgya mtsho rab tu rtogs par byed/ /
spyod pa rgya mtsho rnam par dag byed cing / / smon lam rgya mtsho rab tu rdzogs par byed/ / sangs rgyas rgya mtsho rab tu mchod byed cing / / bskal pa rgya mtshor mi skyo spyad par bgyi/ /
gang yang dus gsum gshegs pa'i rgyal ba yi/ / byang chub spyod pa'i smon lam bye brag rnams/ / bzang po spyod pas byang chub sangs rgyas nas/ / de kun bdag gis ma lus rdzogs par bgyi/ /
rgyal ba kun gyi sras kyi thu bo pa/ / gang gi ming ni kun tu bzang zhes bya; ; mkhas pa de dang mtshungs par spyad pa'i phyir/ / dge ba 'di dag thams cad rab tu bsngo/ /
lus dang ngag dang yid kyang rnam dag cing / / spyod pa rnam dag zhing rnams yongs dag dang / / bsngo ba bzang po mkhas pa ci 'dra ba/ / de 'drar bdag kyang de dang mtshungs par shog /
kun nas dge ba bzang po spyad pa'i phyir/ / 'jam dpal gyi ni smon lam spyad par bgyi/ / ma 'ongs bskal pa kun tu mi skyo bar/ / de yi bya ba ma lus rdzogs par bgyi/ /
spyod pa dag ni tshad yod ma gyur cig / yon tan rnams kyang tshad gzung med par shog / spyod pa tshad med pa la gnas nas kyang / / de dag 'phrul pa thams cad 'tshal bar bgyi/ /
nam mkha'i mthar thug gyur pa ji tsam par/ / sems can ma lus mtha' yang de bzhin te; ; ji tsam las dang nyon mongs mthar gyur pa/ / bdag gi smon lam mtha' yang de tsam mo/ /
gang yang phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams mtha' yas pa/ / rin chen brgyan te rgyal ba rnams la phul; ; lha dang mi yi bde ba mchog rnams kyang / / zhing gi rdul snyed bskal par phul ba bas/ /
gang gis bsngo ba'i rgyal po 'di thos nas/ / byang chub mchog gi rjes su rab mos shing / / lan gcig tsam yang dad pa bskyed pa ni/ / bsod nams dam pa'i mchog tu 'di 'gyur ro/ /
gang gis bzang spyod smon lam 'di btab pa/ / des ni ngan song thams cad spong bar 'gyur/ / des ni grogs po ngan pa'ang spangs pa yin/ / snang ba mtha' yas de yang des myur mthong / /
de dag rnyed pa rab rnyed bde bar 'tsho/ / mi tsho 'dir yang de dag legs par 'ongs; ; kun tu bzang po de yang ci 'dra bar/ / de dag ring por mi thogs de bzhin 'gyur/ /
mtshams med lnga po dag gi sdig pa rnams/ / gang gis mi shes dbang gis byas pa dag / de yis bzang po'i spyod pa 'di brjod na/ / myur du ma lus yongs su byang bar 'gyur/ /
ye shes dang ni gzugs dang mtshan rnams dang / / rigs dang kha dog rnams dang ldan par 'gyur; ; bdud dang mu stegs mang pos de mi thub/ / 'jig rten gsum po kun na'ang mchod par 'gyur/ /
byang chub shing dbang drung du de myur 'gro / song nas sems can phan phyir de 'dug ste; ; byang chub sangs rgyas 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ / bdud rnams sde dang bcas pa thams cad btul/ /
gang yang bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam 'di/ / 'chang ba dang ni ston tam klog na yang / / de yi rnam par smin pa sangs rgyas mkhyen/ / byang chub mchog la som nyi ma byed cig /
'jam dpal ji ltar mkhyen cing dpa' ba dang / / kun tu bzang po de yang de bzhin te/ / de dag gi ni rjes su bdag slob cing / / dge ba 'di dag thams cad rab tu bsngo/ /
dus gsum gshegs pa'i rgyal ba thams cad kyis/ / bsngo ba gang la mchog tu bsngags pa des/ / bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di kun kyang / / bzang po spyod phyir rab tu bsngo bar bgyi/ /
bdag ni 'chi ba'i dus byed gyur pa na/ / sgrib pa thams cad bdag ni phyir bsal te/ / mngon sum snang ba mtha' yas de mthong nas/ / bde ba can gyi zhing der rab tu 'gro /
der song nas ni smon lam 'di dag kyang / / thams cad ma lus mngon du gyur par shog / de dag ma lus bdag gis yongs su bkang / / 'jig rten ji srid sems can phan par bgyi/ /
rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor bzang zhing dga' ba der/ / pad+mo dam pa shin tu mdzes las skyes/ / snang ba mtha' yas rgyal bas mngon sum du/ / lung bstan pa yang bdag gis der thob shog /
der ni bdag gis lung bstan rab thob nas/ / sprul pa mang po bye ba phrag brgya yis/ / blo yi stobs kyis phyogs bcu rnams su yang / / sems can rnams la phan pa mang po bgyi/ /
gang gis bzang po spyod pa ston pa yis/ / dge ba cung zad bdag gis ci bsags pa/ / des ni 'gro ba'i smon lam dge ba rnams; ; skad cig gcig gis thams cad 'byor par shog /
gang yang bzang po spyod pa bsngos pa yis/ / bsod nams mtha' yas dam pa thob pa des/ / 'gro ba sdug bsngal chu bor bying ba rnams/ / 'od dpag med pa'i gnas rab 'gro bar shog /
